original: @174a rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @174a rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i tsa turp'i tha bi khy'a ta tantra r'a dza n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i tsa turp'i tha bi khy'a ta tantra r'a dza n'a ma /
translated: Śrīcaturpīṭhikāvibhāgatantravṛtti-rājikā-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal gdan bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal gdan bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba /
translated: The glorious explanation of the Caturpīṭha Tantra, the king of tantras, called the Śrīcaturpīṭhikāvibhāgatantravṛtti-rājikā-nāma

original: bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor nam mkha' dang // rdo rje rnal 'byor dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs gang g'a klung gi bye ma snyed kyi grangs dang mnyam pa thams cad la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor nam mkha' dang // rdo rje rnal 'byor dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs gang g'a klung gi bye ma snyed kyi grangs dang mnyam pa thams cad la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed One, the sky of yoga, and to the assembly of Vajrayoginīs and Vajrayogins as numerous as the sands of the Ganges, all of whom I respectfully bow to.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gus par phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gus par phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I respectfully bow to the bodhisattva mahāsattva Avalokiteśvara, the one endowed with great compassion.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajrasattva.

original: rnal 'byor rnal 'byor dbang phyug nyid //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnal 'byor dbang phyug nyid //
translated: The very lord of yoga,🔽And likewise the very supreme yoga,

original: de bzhin rnal 'byor mchog nyid dang // drang srong rnams kyi ye shes dbang //
analyzed: de bzhin rnal 'byor mchog nyid dang // drang srong rnams kyi ye shes dbang //
translated: The knowledge empowerment of the sages,

original: rnal 'byor ma yi dra mchog bde //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi dra mchog bde //
translated: The supreme bliss of the yoginīs.

original: gnas gtsang ma na bzhugs nas su //
analyzed: gnas gtsang ma na bzhugs nas su //
translated: Residing in the Pure Abodes,

original: thams cad mkhyen pas 'di skad gsungs //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pas 'di skad gsungs //
translated: The Omniscient One spoke thus:

original: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i dbus nas phyag na rdo rjes thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan @174b 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i dbus nas phyag na rdo rjes thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan @174b 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: In the midst of eight million lords of yoga, Vajrapāṇi, with palms joined, said this to the Blessed One:🔽The special union of the secret,

original: gsang ba sbyor ba'i khyad par dang // bdag ni de nyid ji ltar lha //
analyzed: gsang ba sbyor ba'i khyad par dang // bdag ni de nyid ji ltar lha //
translated: And how am I that reality?

original: chu dang me ni ji ltar lags //
analyzed: chu dang me ni ji ltar lags //
translated: How are water and fire?🔽How is the beautiful sky,

original: ji ltar rab mdzes nam mkha' dang // ye shes ji ltar 'tshal bgyi ba //
analyzed: ji ltar rab mdzes nam mkha' dang // ye shes ji ltar 'tshal bgyi ba //
translated: And how should wisdom be known?

original: ye shes dbang la nyan par 'tshal //
analyzed: ye shes dbang la nyan par 'tshal //
translated: I wish to hear about the empowerment of wisdom.

original: 'khor ba las bsgral mtshan nyid dag /
analyzed: 'khor ba las bsgral mtshan nyid dag /
translated: The characteristics that liberate from saṃsāra,

original: nyon cig dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
analyzed: nyon cig dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
translated: Listen, glorious Vajradhara!

original: dang por dbang gi mtshan nyid dang // gnyis par yi ge gcig dang ni //
analyzed: dang por dbang gi mtshan nyid dang // gnyis par yi ge gcig dang ni //
translated: First, the characteristics of empowerment, second, the single syllable,

original: gsum par sa bon brgyad pa dang // bzhi par rtsa yi lha nyid do //
analyzed: gsum par sa bon brgyad pa dang // bzhi par rtsa yi lha nyid do //
translated: Third, the eight seed syllables, and fourth, the deity of the nāḍīs.

original: bdag nyid lus kyi ye shes me //
analyzed: bdag nyid lus kyi ye shes me //
translated: The wisdom fire of one's own body

original: blo ldan rnal 'byor pas shes bya //
analyzed: blo ldan rnal 'byor pas shes bya //
translated: Should be known by the wise yogī.

original: lto ba me yi thab khung du //
analyzed: lto ba me yi thab khung du //
translated: In the fire-pit of the belly,

original: de yi me la sbyin sreg bya //
analyzed: de yi me la sbyin sreg bya //
translated: one should make an offering to the fire.

original: steng dang 'og dang dbus su ni //
analyzed: steng dang 'og dang dbus su ni //
translated: Above, below, and in the middle,

original: rnam shes rtsa ni bsdam par bya //
analyzed: rnam shes rtsa ni bsdam par bya //
translated: one should bind the consciousness-channel.

original: thog mar bdag nyid lto ba ru //
analyzed: thog mar bdag nyid lto ba ru //
translated: First, in one's own belly,

original: rtsa yi lha ni rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: rtsa yi lha ni rnam par bsgom //
translated: one should visualize the channel deity.

original: lte ba'i me ni 'bar ba la //
analyzed: lte ba'i me ni 'bar ba la //
translated: In the blazing fire of the navel,

original: khyad par kha dog bsgom pa ni //
analyzed: khyad par kha dog bsgom pa ni //
translated: one should visualize the special color.

original: lte ba'i me ni dkar pa'o //
analyzed: lte ba'i me ni dkar pa'o //
translated: The fire of the navel is white,

original: g-yon pa'i me ni de bzhin ser //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i me ni de bzhin ser //
translated: the fire of the left is likewise yellow,

original: lho ni sngon po'i ming can te //
analyzed: lho ni sngon po'i ming can te //
translated: the southern one is called blue,

original: lhag ma 'di ni dmar por sbyang //
analyzed: lhag ma 'di ni dmar por sbyang //
translated: and the remainder is purified as red.

original: de dbus kha dog sngo bsangs su //
analyzed: de dbus kha dog sngo bsangs su //
translated: In the middle of that, the color is dark blue,

original: me yi du bar rab tu grags //
analyzed: me yi du bar rab tu grags //
translated: well known as the smoke of fire.

original: me yi dbus su padma nyid //
analyzed: me yi dbus su padma nyid //
translated: In the middle of the fire, there is a lotus,

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa //
translated: adorned with a sun maṇḍala.

original: de yi dbus su ye shes lha //
analyzed: de yi dbus su ye shes lha //
translated: In the middle of that, the gnosis deity

original: 'khor ba kun las grol bar mdzad //
analyzed: 'khor ba kun las grol bar mdzad //
translated: liberates from all saṃsāra.

original: phyag gnyis sbyor ba'i gdan la ni //
analyzed: phyag gnyis sbyor ba'i gdan la ni //
translated: On the seat of the union of the two hands,

original: rdo rje dril bus rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bus rnam par brgyan //
translated: adorned with a vajra and a bell,

original: g-yas kyi lag na rdo rje dang // rgyan rnams mthon ka'i rtse mo can //
analyzed: g-yas kyi lag na rdo rje dang // rgyan rnams mthon ka'i rtse mo can //
translated: and he is adorned with a crest jewel.

original: bzhad dang khro @175a *//
analyzed: bzhad dang khro @175a *//
translated: Laughing and wrathful,

original: bas h'um sgrogs shing //
analyzed: bas h'um sgrogs shing //
translated: he utters the sound “huṃ.”

original: 'di yi ye shes dbang phyug lha //
analyzed: 'di yi ye shes dbang phyug lha //
translated: The lord of his gnosis

original: de yi dbus su rab tu grags //
analyzed: de yi dbus su rab tu grags //
translated: is renowned in his center.🔽In the east is the goddess Tārā,

original: shar du lha mo sgrol ma dang // byang du de bzhin gos dkar mo //
analyzed: shar du lha mo sgrol ma dang // byang du de bzhin gos dkar mo //
translated: and in the north is Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: nub tu lha mo m'a ma k'i /
analyzed: nub tu lha mo m'a ma k'i /
translated: In the west is the goddess Māmakī,

original: sangs rgyas spyan ni lho ru'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas spyan ni lho ru'o //
translated: and Buddhalocanā is in the south.

original: gzugs ni mthe bo'i tshad tsam du //
analyzed: gzugs ni mthe bo'i tshad tsam du //
translated: The form is the size of a thumb,

original: bdag nyid lha yi lha nyid do //
analyzed: bdag nyid lha yi lha nyid do //
translated: the deity of deities.

original: lce la mchu ni sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: lce la mchu ni sbyar bar bya //
translated: The lips are applied to the tongue,

original: nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la'o //
translated: and space is in the ears and nose.

original: mig la sa 'di rnam par shes //
analyzed: mig la sa 'di rnam par shes //
translated: The eyes are the consciousness of this earth,

original: de bzhin tshangs par 'bar ba'i me //
analyzed: de bzhin tshangs par 'bar ba'i me //
translated: and likewise Brahmā is the blazing fire.🔽The earth of delusion is in the throat,

original: mgrin par rmongs pa'i sa nyid dang // g-yo ba snying la gnas pa nyid //
analyzed: mgrin par rmongs pa'i sa nyid dang // g-yo ba snying la gnas pa nyid //
translated: and movement is located in the heart.

original: thams cad nyon mongs brang dang ni //
analyzed: thams cad nyon mongs brang dang ni //
translated: All afflictions are in the chest,

original: phyugs gnyis lte ba'i rtsa bar ro //
analyzed: phyugs gnyis lte ba'i rtsa bar ro //
translated: and the two cattle are at the root of the navel.

original: yan lag brgyad du bkod nas ni //
analyzed: yan lag brgyad du bkod nas ni //
translated: Having arranged them in the eight limbs,

original: 'di nyid lha ni shes par bya //🔽rnam shes rtsa nas drangs pa yi //
analyzed: 'di nyid lha ni shes par bya // rnam shes rtsa nas drangs pa yi //
translated: One should know this to be the deity.🔽The nine nectars

original: de bzhin du ni bdud rtsi dgu /
analyzed: de bzhin du ni bdud rtsi dgu /
translated: are drawn up from the nāḍīs of the consciousness.

original: steng gi mche ba gnyis pa'i rtsa //
analyzed: steng gi mche ba gnyis pa'i rtsa //
translated: The nāḍī of the two upper fangs

original: kun tu tshva bzhin zhu ltar babs //
analyzed: kun tu tshva bzhin zhu ltar babs //
translated: melts like a pervasive frost.

original: ji bzhin chu ni 'o ma'i ming //
analyzed: ji bzhin chu ni 'o ma'i ming //
translated: Just as water is called “milk”

original: lce yi steng du bsten pa yi //
analyzed: lce yi steng du bsten pa yi //
translated: when it is placed on the tongue,

original: nyi ma thig le 'bar ba yis //
analyzed: nyi ma thig le 'bar ba yis //
translated: the blazing bindu of the sun

original: 'khor lo phra rab rdul bzhin no //
analyzed: 'khor lo phra rab rdul bzhin no //
translated: is like a subtle particle of a wheel.

original: steng gi nam mkha' nam mkha' ni //
analyzed: steng gi nam mkha' nam mkha' ni //
translated: The space of the upper space

original: bsreg pa'i bdag nyid du ni thim //
analyzed: bsreg pa'i bdag nyid du ni thim //
translated: dissolves into the nature of fire.

original: g-yon pa'i dbugs ni bud med nyid //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i dbugs ni bud med nyid //
translated: The left breath is a woman,

original: g-yas pa de bzhin skyes bu'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa de bzhin skyes bu'o //
translated: and the right is a man.

original: 'og dang steng ni 'di yi rtsa //
analyzed: 'og dang steng ni 'di yi rtsa //
translated: The nāḍīs of the upper and lower

original: 'og ni sngon du rab tu grags //
analyzed: 'og ni sngon du rab tu grags //
translated: are renowned as the lower and upper.

original: dbugs dang dri ni mnyam drangs nas //
analyzed: dbugs dang dri ni mnyam drangs nas //
translated: Drawing in the breath and smell together,

original: rgyas pa'i lnga yi steng du ni //
analyzed: rgyas pa'i lnga yi steng du ni //
translated: on top of the five of increase,

original: rnam shes gnyis kyi rtsa nas drang //
analyzed: rnam shes gnyis kyi rtsa nas drang //
translated: the consciousness is drawn up from the nāḍīs.

original: bdud rtsi de la rnam par thim //
analyzed: bdud rtsi de la rnam par thim //
translated: The nectar dissolves into that.

original: ye shes dbang phyug @175b de'i steng du //
analyzed: ye shes dbang phyug @175b de'i steng du //
translated: On top of that is the lord of gnosis.

original: de la bdud rtsis bkru bar bya //
analyzed: de la bdud rtsis bkru bar bya //
translated: One should wash with the nectar.

original: de ltar kun tu bzhin rdubs nas //
analyzed: de ltar kun tu bzhin rdubs nas //
translated: Having inhaled in this way,

original: dbugs mi g-yo bar bsgom par bya //
analyzed: dbugs mi g-yo bar bsgom par bya //
translated: one should meditate on the breath as unmoving.

original: lag mthil zla ba nyi ma bsgom //🔽ye shes yi ges de dbus so //
analyzed: lag mthil zla ba nyi ma bsgom // ye shes yi ges de dbus so //
translated: One should meditate on the moon and sun🔽in the palm of the hand, in the center of which is the syllable of gnosis.

original: ri dvags mgo bo'i phyag rgya yis //
analyzed: ri dvags mgo bo'i phyag rgya yis //
translated: With the mudra of the deer head,

original: khams lnga'i bdag nyid bsreg pa'o //
analyzed: khams lnga'i bdag nyid bsreg pa'o //
translated: one should burn the five elements.

original: sngon du sa bon h'um byas nas //
analyzed: sngon du sa bon h'um byas nas //
translated: Having first made the seed syllable hūṃ,

original: gnyis par de bzhin gsum dang ni //
analyzed: gnyis par de bzhin gsum dang ni //
translated: in the second [part] likewise the third,

original: gsum par bzod pas bza' ba'o //
analyzed: gsum par bzod pas bza' ba'o //
translated: and in the third, one should eat with patience.🔽Likewise, in the fourth, not wind, and in the fifth,

original: de bzhin rlung min bzhi pa dang // lnga par dad pa'i sa bon gyis //
analyzed: de bzhin rlung min bzhi pa dang // lnga par dad pa'i sa bon gyis //
translated: with the seed syllable of faith,

original: mkhas pas khams lnga'i sbyin sreg bya //
analyzed: mkhas pas khams lnga'i sbyin sreg bya //
translated: the wise one should perform the fire sacrifice of the five elements.

original: bdag gi de nyid me la ni //
analyzed: bdag gi de nyid me la ni //
translated: In the fire of one’s own reality,

original: bdag nyid sbyor bas bsregs pa nyid //
analyzed: bdag nyid sbyor bas bsregs pa nyid //
translated: one should burn oneself with one’s own application.

original: ji ltar ye shes me de ni //
analyzed: ji ltar ye shes me de ni //
translated: Just as that fire of gnosis

original: bsreg pa'i bdag nyid rab tu grags //
analyzed: bsreg pa'i bdag nyid rab tu grags //
translated: is renowned as the essence of burning,

original: sbyin sreg byas pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba dang po rdzogs so ////
analyzed: sbyin sreg byas pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba dang po rdzogs so ////
translated: The first chapter of the tantra called “The Application of Fire Sacrifice” is complete.

original: stong pa'i bdag nyid dge ba yis //
analyzed: stong pa'i bdag nyid dge ba yis //
translated: By the virtue of the nature of emptiness,

original: skye ba'i dra ba rnam 'jig pas //
analyzed: skye ba'i dra ba rnam 'jig pas //
translated: destroying the net of birth,

original: 'khor ba ru ni mi gnas pa //
analyzed: 'khor ba ru ni mi gnas pa //
translated: one does not remain in saṃsāra.

original: bcom ldan 'das la mnyan par 'tshal //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la mnyan par 'tshal //
translated: We wish to hear from the Bhagavān.

original: stong pa'i de nyid rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: stong pa'i de nyid rang bzhin gyis //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of that

original: nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang //
analyzed: nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang //
translated: Listen, O King Vajradhara!🔽The continents, Mount Meru,

original: gling gzhan de bzhin ri rab dang // sa ni nam mkhar kun tu bsam //🔽rgya mtsho chu yi dbyibs dang ni //
analyzed: gling gzhan de bzhin ri rab dang // sa ni nam mkhar kun tu bsam // rgya mtsho chu yi dbyibs dang ni //
translated: the earth, and space are all imagined.🔽The shape of the ocean water

original: yid 'ong padma 'byung bar ldan //
analyzed: yid 'ong padma 'byung bar ldan //
translated: is endowed with the arising of a beautiful lotus.

original: stong pa'i mtshan nyid sngon 'gro bas //
analyzed: stong pa'i mtshan nyid sngon 'gro bas //
translated: The characteristic of emptiness precedes

original: me yi bdag nyid bsgom par bya //
analyzed: me yi bdag nyid bsgom par bya //
translated: the meditation on the nature of fire.

original: shar du lha mo sgrol ma 'di //
analyzed: shar du lha mo sgrol ma 'di //
translated: In the east, this is the goddess Tārā,

original: de bzhin byang du gos dkar mo //
analyzed: de bzhin byang du gos dkar mo //
translated: and likewise, in the north, Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: m'a ma k'i ni nub phyogs su //
analyzed: m'a ma k'i ni nub phyogs su //
translated: In the west, Māmakī,

original: lhor ni lha mo sangs rgyas spyan //
analyzed: lhor ni lha mo sangs rgyas spyan //
translated: and in the south, Buddhalocanā.

original: chu ni sgrol mar kun @176a *//
analyzed: chu ni sgrol mar kun @176a *//
translated: The water completely dissolves into Tārā,

original: tu thim // me ni gos dkar ma la thim //
analyzed: tu thim // me ni gos dkar ma la thim //
translated: and the fire dissolves into Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: m'a ma k'i ni nub nas sa //
analyzed: m'a ma k'i ni nub nas sa //
translated: Māmakī is in the west,

original: rlung ni sangs rgyas spyan la thim //
analyzed: rlung ni sangs rgyas spyan la thim //
translated: and the wind dissolves into Buddhalocanā.

original: chu shing me tog padma 'di //
analyzed: chu shing me tog padma 'di //
translated: This banana flower lotus

original: sgong skyes ye shes kyi ni gdan //
analyzed: sgong skyes ye shes kyi ni gdan //
translated: is the seat of the wisdom of the egg birth.

original: de yi ye shes rgyal dbang mo //
analyzed: de yi ye shes rgyal dbang mo //
translated: Her wisdom is the powerful queen,

original: sgong skyes 'og tu 'byed pa can //
analyzed: sgong skyes 'og tu 'byed pa can //
translated: and below the egg birth, there is the one with the cleft.

original: gzugs med srid pa'i dbyibs can //
analyzed: gzugs med srid pa'i dbyibs can //
translated: Formless existence has the shape of space.

original: ye shes rgyal po nyid du thim //
analyzed: ye shes rgyal po nyid du thim //
translated: The king of pristine consciousnesses dissolves into itself.

original: de ltar bdag nyid stong pa nyid; ;de nyid de nyid stong pa nyid //
analyzed: de ltar bdag nyid stong pa nyid; ;de nyid de nyid stong pa nyid //
translated: Thus, one’s emptiness is the emptiness of thatness itself.

original: 'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par //
analyzed: 'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par //
translated: Without fear and without harm,

original: dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya //
analyzed: dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya //
translated: one should meditate on entities with entities.

original: ji ltar stong nyid de bsgoms la //
analyzed: ji ltar stong nyid de bsgoms la //
translated: Having meditated on emptiness in that way,🔽wash the stains of the body well,

original: lus kyi dri ma rab tu bkru; ;phyis ni chu yi gzugs su bsgom //
analyzed: lus kyi dri ma rab tu bkru; ;phyis ni chu yi gzugs su bsgom //
translated: and later meditate on the form of water.

original: dmar bo 'dab ma brgyad dang ni //
analyzed: dmar bo 'dab ma brgyad dang ni //
translated: Red, with eight petals,

original: ge sar lte bar bcas pa yis //
analyzed: ge sar lte bar bcas pa yis //
translated: with stamens and a center,

original: dbus su padmas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: dbus su padmas rnam par brgyan //
translated: adorned in the center with a lotus,

original: 'dab brgyad la ni lha mo yi; ;sa bon brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: 'dab brgyad la ni lha mo yi; ;sa bon brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan //
translated: adorned with the eight seed syllables of the goddesses on the eight petals.🔽In the east, it is called “si,”

original: shar du si ka zhes bya dang // byang du bzod pa'i sa bon bzhin //
analyzed: shar du si ka zhes bya dang // byang du bzod pa'i sa bon bzhin //
translated: and in the north, it is like the seed of patience.

original: nub tu rlung gi sa bon gsungs //
analyzed: nub tu rlung gi sa bon gsungs //
translated: In the west, the seed of air is taught,

original: lho ru h'um gi dbang phyug go /🔽dbang ldan du ni dbang po'i dbyangs //
analyzed: lho ru h'um gi dbang phyug go / dbang ldan du ni dbang po'i dbyangs //
translated: and in the south, the lord of hūṃ.🔽In the northeast, the sound of Indra,

original: me phyogs sgra dang rnam shes so //
analyzed: me phyogs sgra dang rnam shes so //
translated: and in the southeast, sound and consciousness.

original: bden bral dbyangs yig brgyad pa dang // rlung du dbyangs yig lnga pa'o //
analyzed: bden bral dbyangs yig brgyad pa dang // rlung du dbyangs yig lnga pa'o //
translated: and in the wind [direction], the fifth vowel [u].

original: dbus su ye shes rgyal po 'di //
analyzed: dbus su ye shes rgyal po 'di //
translated: In the center, this King of Knowledge

original: sgong skyes ye shes dbang phyug ni //
analyzed: sgong skyes ye shes dbang phyug ni //
translated: is the lord of the egg-born.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis dkris pa //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis dkris pa //
translated: He is embraced by a sun maṇḍala,

original: bdud rtsi sa bon 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi sa bon 'bar ba'o //
translated: the blazing seed of nectar.

original: kha dog bdun pa'i me 'di ni //
analyzed: kha dog bdun pa'i me 'di ni //
translated: This fire of the seven colors

original: go 'phang mchog gis @176b bsgom par bya //
analyzed: go 'phang mchog gis @176b bsgom par bya //
translated: should be contemplated with the supreme state.

original: dbugs mi g-yo ba'i sems dpa' yis //
analyzed: dbugs mi g-yo ba'i sems dpa' yis //
translated: The being of the motionless breath,

original: dngos pos dngos po bsgom byas nas //
analyzed: dngos pos dngos po bsgom byas nas //
translated: having contemplated the entity with an entity,

original: phyis ni rtsa nyid lha yi gdan //
analyzed: phyis ni rtsa nyid lha yi gdan //
translated: later the nāḍīs are the seat of the deity.🔽In the eyes, the seed of earth,

original: mig la sa yi sa bon dang // nam mkha' sna dang rna ba la'o //
analyzed: mig la sa yi sa bon dang // nam mkha' sna dang rna ba la'o //
translated: in the nose and ears, space.

original: lce la bdud rtsi'i sa bon 'di //
analyzed: lce la bdud rtsi'i sa bon 'di //
translated: In the tongue, this seed of nectar,

original: snying gar h'um zhes bya ba'i ming //
analyzed: snying gar h'um zhes bya ba'i ming //
translated: in the heart, the name “huṃ.”

original: yan lag drug 'dzin sa bon gyis //
analyzed: yan lag drug 'dzin sa bon gyis //
translated: With the seed of the holder of the six limbs,

original: rnal 'byor lus ni rnam par bsrung //
analyzed: rnal 'byor lus ni rnam par bsrung //
translated: the yogin’s body is protected.

original: ye shes lus 'di shes byas pas //
analyzed: ye shes lus 'di shes byas pas //
translated: Having understood this body of knowledge,

original: ci yi phyir na skye bo'i ming //
analyzed: ci yi phyir na skye bo'i ming //
translated: why is it the name of a person?

original: gzugs med ye shes gzugs can dang // kha dog med cing mtshon kun dngos //
analyzed: gzugs med ye shes gzugs can dang // kha dog med cing mtshon kun dngos //
translated: Without color, the entity of all symbols,🔽Without abode, having the shape of an abode,

original: gnas med gnas kyi dbyibs can dang // mi rigs de bzhin rigs pa nyid //
analyzed: gnas med gnas kyi dbyibs can dang // mi rigs de bzhin rigs pa nyid //
translated: Unreasonable, and likewise reasonable.

original: stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
translated: This concludes chapter two, the chapter on emptiness.

original: bdag nyid lnga yi bye brag nyid //
analyzed: bdag nyid lnga yi bye brag nyid //
translated: The distinctions of the five natures

original: bcom ldan 'das la mnyan par 'tshal //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la mnyan par 'tshal //
translated: Are to be heard from the Bhagavān.

original: nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang //
analyzed: nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang //
translated: Listen, King Vajradhara!

original: gnyis dang gnyis med la brten nas //
analyzed: gnyis dang gnyis med la brten nas //
translated: Based on the two and non-two,

original: bskal pa bzang po brgya yi sngon //
analyzed: bskal pa bzang po brgya yi sngon //
translated: In the past, a hundred kalpas ago,

original: dag pa'i gnas la kun tu gnas //
analyzed: dag pa'i gnas la kun tu gnas //
translated: Abiding in the pure state,

original: ri rab lha mo sangs rgyas spyan //
analyzed: ri rab lha mo sangs rgyas spyan //
translated: The goddess of Mount Meru, Buddhalocanā,

original: m'a ma k'i ni lho phyogs gnas //
analyzed: m'a ma k'i ni lho phyogs gnas //
translated: Is in the south, Māmakī,

original: lha mo sgrol ma nub kyi gling //
analyzed: lha mo sgrol ma nub kyi gling //
translated: The goddess Tārā is in the western continent,

original: de bzhin byang du gos dkar mo //
analyzed: de bzhin byang du gos dkar mo //
translated: And likewise, Pāṇḍaravāsinī is in the north.

original: shar du lha mo snyan ma 'di //
analyzed: shar du lha mo snyan ma 'di //
translated: In the east, this goddess Umā

original: lha mo rnam pa lnga yi gnas //
analyzed: lha mo rnam pa lnga yi gnas //
translated: Is the abode of the five goddesses.🔽Thus, the Meru in the heart,

original: de ltar snying ga ri rab dang // de bzhin mgo bo m'a ma k'i //
analyzed: de ltar snying ga ri rab dang // de bzhin mgo bo m'a ma k'i //
translated: And likewise, the Māmakī in the head,

original: sgrol ma lho yi gnas dang ni //
analyzed: sgrol ma lho yi gnas dang ni //
translated: Tārā in the southern abode,🔽And likewise, Pāṇḍaravāsinī in the north,🔽And the goddess Umā in the east.

original: g-yon pa de bzhin gos dkar mo //
analyzed: g-yon pa de bzhin gos dkar mo //
translated: The left is likewise Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: snyan pa mo 'di bdag gis gnas //
analyzed: snyan pa mo 'di bdag gis gnas //
translated: This Śabdavajrā is my abode.

original: lha mo lnga yis byin gyis @177a *//
analyzed: lha mo lnga yis byin gyis @177a *//
translated: I am blessed by the five goddesses.🔽In the middle of the lotus is the vajra,

original: brlab // padma'i dbus su rdo rje dang // rdo rje'i dbus su padma can //
analyzed: brlab // padma'i dbus su rdo rje dang // rdo rje'i dbus su padma can //
translated: and in the middle of the vajra is the lotus.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi kun thim pa //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi kun thim pa //
translated: Vajra Amṛta dissolves into all.

original: lus po kun nas dkris pa'o //🔽yan lag brgyad kyi rtsa nyid du //
analyzed: lus po kun nas dkris pa'o // yan lag brgyad kyi rtsa nyid du //
translated: It completely pervades the body.

original: bdud rtsi'i chu ni rnam par thim //
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i chu ni rnam par thim //
translated: The water of Amṛta dissolves into the eight channels.

original: lha yi gnas ni nam mkha' nyid //
analyzed: lha yi gnas ni nam mkha' nyid //
translated: The abode of the gods is the sky itself.

original: rdo rje'i sa bon du rab shes //
analyzed: rdo rje'i sa bon du rab shes //
translated: It is well known as the seed of the vajra.

original: bdag nyid lus la bsgoms pa ni //
analyzed: bdag nyid lus la bsgoms pa ni //
translated: Meditating on the body of oneself

original: rdo rje'i rtse zhes rab tu grags //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rtse zhes rab tu grags //
translated: is well known as the tip of the vajra.

original: de yi lus kyi khrag dang ni //
analyzed: de yi lus kyi khrag dang ni //
translated: The blood of one's body

original: lus dang lhan cig bcas par gnas //
analyzed: lus dang lhan cig bcas par gnas //
translated: remains together with the body.

original: khrag dang chu ni kun sbyor bas //
analyzed: khrag dang chu ni kun sbyor bas //
translated: The blood and water are combined,

original: blo ldan yan lag brgyad nas 'dzag /
analyzed: blo ldan yan lag brgyad nas 'dzag /
translated: and the wise one drips from the eight channels.

original: ji ltar bdag gis sa bon lnga //
analyzed: ji ltar bdag gis sa bon lnga //
translated: Just as the five seeds,

original: de ltar padma yi yang bsgom //
analyzed: de ltar padma yi yang bsgom //
translated: so too one should meditate on the lotus.

original: ji ltar bdag nyid lus 'di ni //
analyzed: ji ltar bdag nyid lus 'di ni //
translated: Just as this body of mine

original: nam mkha' rdo rje 'jig byed do //
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje 'jig byed do //
translated: destroys the vajra of space.

original: rkang pas rkang pa dkri bya zhing //
analyzed: rkang pas rkang pa dkri bya zhing //
translated: The feet should be crossed over the feet,

original: mchu yis mchu ni btsir byas la; ;gnyi ga'i lag pa phyag rgya ni //
analyzed: mchu yis mchu ni btsir byas la; ;gnyi ga'i lag pa phyag rgya ni //
translated: and the beak should be pressed against the beak;🔽the mudra of both hands

original: rtse mo gsum pa'i rdo rje brtag /
analyzed: rtse mo gsum pa'i rdo rje brtag /
translated: is the three-pointed vajra.🔽By the natural firmness of the teeth,

original: rang bzhin gyis ni so sra dang // snying ga'i rnam shes bsgom pa yi //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni so sra dang // snying ga'i rnam shes bsgom pa yi //
translated: meditating on the consciousness at the heart,

original: ye shes rgyal po'i lus can 'di //
analyzed: ye shes rgyal po'i lus can 'di //
translated: this embodiment of the wisdom king🔽is the vajra-holder.

original: skyes bus khros pas h'um byas nas //
analyzed: skyes bus khros pas h'um byas nas //
translated: The person, having made the sound hūṃ in anger,

original: de ltar rdo rje padma 'di //
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje padma 'di //
translated: thus this vajra and lotus

original: rnal 'byor bsdus pas bskyod par bya //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bsdus pas bskyod par bya //
translated: are moved by the concentrated yogī.

original: gnyi ga dga' zhing tshim pa yis //
analyzed: gnyi ga dga' zhing tshim pa yis //
translated: By the delight and satisfaction of both,

original: lha rnams thams cad mchod par bya //
analyzed: lha rnams thams cad mchod par bya //
translated: all the gods are worshipped.

original: khrag dang khu ba las byung ba'i //
analyzed: khrag dang khu ba las byung ba'i //
translated: From the seed that arises from blood and semen,

original: sa bon myu gus 'gro ba la //
analyzed: sa bon myu gus 'gro ba la //
translated: the sprout is the origin of the world.

original: lha rnams lus ni yang dag 'byung //
analyzed: lha rnams lus ni yang dag 'byung //
translated: The gods truly arise from the body.

original: 'dod la dga' nyid ma yin te //
analyzed: 'dod la dga' nyid ma yin te //
translated: It is not just for the pleasure of desire,

original: longs spyod phyir yang gnas @177b mi bya //
analyzed: longs spyod phyir yang gnas @177b mi bya //
translated: but also for the sake of enjoyment.

original: sems can don phyir 'dod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: sems can don phyir 'dod pa'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of sentient beings, for the sake of desire,

original: yongs su rdzogs pa'i yid 'od sku //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa'i yid 'od sku //
translated: the mind is completely perfected in the body.

original: gnyis med sbyor ba la gnas par //
analyzed: gnyis med sbyor ba la gnas par //
translated: Abiding in the union of nonduality,

original: gtor ma sngon du sbyin par bya //
analyzed: gtor ma sngon du sbyin par bya //
translated: The torma should be given beforehand.

original: sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba gsum pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba gsum pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The third chapter is concluded, called “The Chapter on Union.”

original: nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang //
analyzed: nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang //
translated: Listen, King Vajradhara!

original: de nyid bcu yi bye brag nyid //
analyzed: de nyid bcu yi bye brag nyid //
translated: The ten suchnesses are

original: yi ge bcu ru sngon sbyar bya //
analyzed: yi ge bcu ru sngon sbyar bya //
translated: to be applied to the ten syllables

original: lnga yi bdag nyid du rdzogs bya //🔽lnga pa lnga yi bdag nyid kyi //
analyzed: lnga yi bdag nyid du rdzogs bya // lnga pa lnga yi bdag nyid kyi //
translated: and perfected in the nature of five.🔽The five are to be protected

original: lnga yi lus ni yongs su bsrungs //
analyzed: lnga yi lus ni yongs su bsrungs //
translated: by the body of five.

original: yi ge bcu ni ji ltar lags //
analyzed: yi ge bcu ni ji ltar lags //
translated: What are the ten syllables?

original: ji ltar bdag nyid la 'di sbyar //
analyzed: ji ltar bdag nyid la 'di sbyar //
translated: How are they applied to the self?🔽How are they purified and meditated upon?

original: ji ltar sbyang zhing bsgom pa dang // ji ltar sa bon myu gu ste //
analyzed: ji ltar sbyang zhing bsgom pa dang // ji ltar sa bon myu gu ste //
translated: How are they seeds and sprouts?

original: ji ltar thar pa la gnas gnyis //
analyzed: ji ltar thar pa la gnas gnyis //
translated: How are they the two abodes of liberation?

original: ngo mtshar lha la nyan par 'tshal //
analyzed: ngo mtshar lha la nyan par 'tshal //
translated: I wish to hear from the wondrous deity.

original: gsang ba gsang ba zhes bya ba //
analyzed: gsang ba gsang ba zhes bya ba //
translated: The secret of secrets

original: rgyal po ji bzhin de nyid nyon //
analyzed: rgyal po ji bzhin de nyid nyon //
translated: is to be known by the king just as it is.

original: thog mar stong pa de kho na //
analyzed: thog mar stong pa de kho na //
translated: First, that suchness is emptiness.

original: stong par chu ni bsam par bya //
analyzed: stong par chu ni bsam par bya //
translated: Water is to be imagined as empty.

original: kha dog bdun gyi padma ni //
analyzed: kha dog bdun gyi padma ni //
translated: A lotus with seven colors

original: gsar dang bcas yid 'ong ba //
analyzed: gsar dang bcas yid 'ong ba //
translated: is fresh and pleasing to the mind.

original: stong phrag brgya yi khyon tsam gyis //
analyzed: stong phrag brgya yi khyon tsam gyis //
translated: With a size of one hundred thousand leagues,

original: padma'i gzugs ni snying po bcas //
analyzed: padma'i gzugs ni snying po bcas //
translated: The form of the lotus with its essence,

original: padma rgya cher rab mdzes pa //
analyzed: padma rgya cher rab mdzes pa //
translated: The lotus is very beautiful when fully opened,

original: rin chen bdun gyis mngon par spras //
analyzed: rin chen bdun gyis mngon par spras //
translated: Adorned with the seven jewels,🔽With a garland of ringing bells,

original: dril bu dra ba'i phreng ba dang // dar dang na bza' mngon par 'phyang //
analyzed: dril bu dra ba'i phreng ba dang // dar dang na bza' mngon par 'phyang //
translated: And with silk garments hanging down.

original: seng ge'i gdan ni mngon par bsam //
analyzed: seng ge'i gdan ni mngon par bsam //
translated: One should visualize a lion throne,

original: de steng nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de steng nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Above which is a sun maṇḍala.

original: padma rdo rje'i ngo bo 'di //
analyzed: padma rdo rje'i ngo bo 'di //
translated: This lotus is the essence of the vajra,

original: 'od zer nyi ma bye ba yi //
analyzed: 'od zer nyi ma bye ba yi //
translated: With light rays like ten million suns.

original: sangs rgyas lnga yi sa bon gyis //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga yi sa bon gyis //
translated: With the seed syllables of the five buddhas,

original: rdo rje rtse mo rnam par bsam //
analyzed: rdo rje rtse mo rnam par bsam //
translated: One should visualize the vajra peak.

original: dbus su rnam par snang mdzad dgyes //
analyzed: dbus su rnam par snang mdzad dgyes //
translated: In the center is the joyful Vairocana,

original: shar du de bzhin mi bskyod @178a *//
analyzed: shar du de bzhin mi bskyod @178a *//
translated: In the east is Akṣobhya,

original: pa; ;rin chen sa bon lho nyid du //
analyzed: pa; ;rin chen sa bon lho nyid du //
translated: And in the south is Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: de bzhin nub tu 'od dpag med //
analyzed: de bzhin nub tu 'od dpag med //
translated: Likewise, in the west is Amitābha,

original: byang phyogs su ni don yod grub //
analyzed: byang phyogs su ni don yod grub //
translated: And in the north is Amoghasiddhi.

original: sa bon lnga ni rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: sa bon lnga ni rnam par bsgom //
translated: One should visualize the five seed syllables.

original: padma byang chub yan lag brgyad //
analyzed: padma byang chub yan lag brgyad //
translated: The lotus has eight branches of enlightenment.

original: ji bzhin sa la rab tu brtag /
analyzed: ji bzhin sa la rab tu brtag /
translated: One should visualize them on the ground as they are.

original: dbus su snying po sgo nga la //
analyzed: dbus su snying po sgo nga la //
translated: In the center, in the essence of the egg,

original: rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid thim //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid thim //
translated: The nature of consciousness dissolves.

original: padma brgyad pa'i rtse mor ni //
analyzed: padma brgyad pa'i rtse mor ni //
translated: On the tips of the eight lotuses🔽is the Lord, the Illuminator.

original: mnga' bdag de bzhin rnam snang mdzad; ;shar du lha mo sgrol ma 'di //
analyzed: mnga' bdag de bzhin rnam snang mdzad; ;shar du lha mo sgrol ma 'di //
translated: In the east is the Goddess Tara,

original: byang du lha mo sangs rgyas spyan //🔽nub tu bsam pa gos dkar mo //
analyzed: byang du lha mo sangs rgyas spyan // nub tu bsam pa gos dkar mo //
translated: in the north is the Goddess Buddhalocana,🔽in the west is the Goddess Marichi,

original: de bzhin lho ru m'a ma k'i //🔽'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang por //
analyzed: de bzhin lho ru m'a ma k'i // 'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang por //
translated: and in the south is the Goddess Mamaki.🔽One should visualize them as fearless,

original: 'jigs pa med par bsgom par bya //
analyzed: 'jigs pa med par bsgom par bya //
translated: with many blazing rays of light.

original: rdo rje las ni lha yi lus //
analyzed: rdo rje las ni lha yi lus //
translated: The divine body of Vajrakarman

original: bzhugs pa ru ni rnam par bsam //
analyzed: bzhugs pa ru ni rnam par bsam //
translated: is visualized as standing.

original: spyan gsum phyag ni drug pa'o //
analyzed: spyan gsum phyag ni drug pa'o //
translated: He has three eyes and six arms,

original: kha dog sngon po rab tu mdzes //
analyzed: kha dog sngon po rab tu mdzes //
translated: and is very beautiful, blue in color.🔽He has a vajra crest,

original: rdo rje yi ni cod pan can; ;dar gyis bcings shing rnam par 'phyang //
analyzed: rdo rje yi ni cod pan can; ;dar gyis bcings shing rnam par 'phyang //
translated: is bound with silk, and is radiant.🔽He is laughing, wrathful, and charming,

original: rgod cing khro dang sgeg pa dang // sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
analyzed: rgod cing khro dang sgeg pa dang // sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
translated: and sits in the sattvaparyaṅka posture.🔽He brandishes a sword above,

original: steng du ral gri 'phyar ba dang // gnyis pa la ni de bzhin gzhu //
analyzed: steng du ral gri 'phyar ba dang // gnyis pa la ni de bzhin gzhu //
translated: and in the second [hand] a bow.

original: gsum par rdo rje gdengs pa gsor //
analyzed: gsum par rdo rje gdengs pa gsor //
translated: In the third he holds a raised vajra.🔽In the left [hands] he holds a khaṭvāṅga and

original: g-yon pa'i steng du kha tv'am dang // gnyis pas lha mo'i nu ma 'tshir //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i steng du kha tv'am dang // gnyis pas lha mo'i nu ma 'tshir //
translated: with the second he squeezes the breasts of the Goddess.

original: gsum pas dril bu'i sgra sgrogs shing //
analyzed: gsum pas dril bu'i sgra sgrogs shing //
translated: The third holds a bell and makes the sound of it.

original: rab tu mdzes pa'i na bza' mnabs //
analyzed: rab tu mdzes pa'i na bza' mnabs //
translated: She is dressed in beautiful garments.

original: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can //
analyzed: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can //
translated: She has a tiger-skin skirt.🔽She is endowed with all the ornaments,

original: rgyan kun phun sum tshogs pa dang // me tog phreng bas rab tu brgyan //
analyzed: rgyan kun phun sum tshogs pa dang // me tog phreng bas rab tu brgyan //
translated: and is adorned with flower garlands.

original: g-yon du lha mo sgrol ma ni //
analyzed: g-yon du lha mo sgrol ma ni //
translated: To the left is the goddess Tārā,

original: phyag gcig @178b gis ni 'khyud pa dang // gcig gi phyag na thod pa ni //
analyzed: phyag gcig @178b gis ni 'khyud pa dang // gcig gi phyag na thod pa ni //
translated: embracing with one hand and holding a skull-cup

original: bdud rtsi'i chu dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i chu dang yang dag ldan //
translated: in the other, filled with the water of nectar.

original: m'a ma k'i yang de bzhin du //🔽gcig gi phyag gis mngon par 'khyud //
analyzed: m'a ma k'i yang de bzhin du // gcig gi phyag gis mngon par 'khyud //
translated: So also is Māmakī,🔽embracing with one hand

original: gcig gi phyag gi thod pa na //
analyzed: gcig gi phyag gi thod pa na //
translated: and holding a skull-cup

original: khrag dang sha yis gang ba'o //
analyzed: khrag dang sha yis gang ba'o //
translated: filled with blood and flesh in the other.

original: spyan ma rgyab tu kun nas bsam //
analyzed: spyan ma rgyab tu kun nas bsam //
translated: One should visualize Pāṇḍarā behind,🔽adorned with a rosary in one hand

original: phreng bas phyag ni brgyan pa dang // gtor ma sbyangs pa'i phyag gnyis pa //
analyzed: phreng bas phyag ni brgyan pa dang // gtor ma sbyangs pa'i phyag gnyis pa //
translated: and a sacrificial ladle in the other.🔽She looks into the vessel in front.

original: mdun du snod la rnam par blta; ;de ltar bdag nyid lnga yi lus //
analyzed: mdun du snod la rnam par blta; ;de ltar bdag nyid lnga yi lus //
translated: Thus the five bodies are

original: lus la kun nas yang dag gnas //
analyzed: lus la kun nas yang dag gnas //
translated: present in the body.

original: shar du lha mo me tog ma //
analyzed: shar du lha mo me tog ma //
translated: In the east is the goddess Puṣpā,

original: lho ru spos dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: lho ru spos dang yang dag ldan //
translated: In the south, she is endowed with incense.

original: nub tu mar me'i lag pa ma //
analyzed: nub tu mar me'i lag pa ma //
translated: In the west, she is Lamp-in-Hand.🔽In the north, she is Fragrance Goddess.

original: byang du dri yi lha mo'o; ;dbang ldan du ni sgeg mo nyid //🔽de bzhin me phyogs phreng ba ma //
analyzed: byang du dri yi lha mo'o; ;dbang ldan du ni sgeg mo nyid // de bzhin me phyogs phreng ba ma //
translated: In the northeast, she is Charm.🔽In the southeast, she is Garland.🔽In the southwest, she is Song.

original: bden bral phyogs su dbyangs ma dang // rlung du gar ma brgyad pa'o //🔽nyi ma bye ba brgya stong gi /
analyzed: bden bral phyogs su dbyangs ma dang // rlung du gar ma brgyad pa'o // nyi ma bye ba brgya stong gi /
translated: In the northwest, she is Dance.🔽She is the color of many light rays

original: 'od zer rnam pa mang po'i mdog /
analyzed: 'od zer rnam pa mang po'i mdog /

original: sangs rgyas sprin ltar 'phro ba ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sprin ltar 'phro ba ni //

analyzed: sems can sgrol la mchog tu brtson // bdag nyid lha dang lha gzhan ni //
translated: And is intent on liberating sentient beings.🔽She is the supreme deity,

original: bdag nyid lha ni mchog yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid lha ni mchog yin no //
translated: Not another deity.

original: bdag nyid gzugs su mi nus pas //
analyzed: bdag nyid gzugs su mi nus pas //
translated: Since she cannot be embodied,

original: gzugs brnyan la sogs bsgom par bya //🔽phyis ni de yi mdun nyid du //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan la sogs bsgom par bya // phyis ni de yi mdun nyid du //
translated: One should meditate on her image and so forth.🔽Later, the wise one should make offerings

original: mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya //
analyzed: mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya //
translated: Right in front of her.🔽One should imagine that she is a lotus

original: de nyid padma bsam pa dang // de nyid gzhal yas khang pa bsam //
analyzed: de nyid padma bsam pa dang // de nyid gzhal yas khang pa bsam //

original: sngon du gsungs pa'i gdan la ni //
analyzed: sngon du gsungs pa'i gdan la ni //
translated: On the seat previously described,

original: der ni nyi mas mngon par g-yogs //
analyzed: der ni nyi mas mngon par g-yogs //

original: sna tshogs rin chen mchod pa dang // sna tshogs dar ni mngon par dbyangs //
analyzed: sna tshogs rin chen mchod pa dang // sna tshogs dar ni mngon par dbyangs //
translated: and various cloths are spread out.

original: lag @179a *// gnyis thal mo sbyar byas nas //
analyzed: lag @179a *// gnyis thal mo sbyar byas nas //

original: padma'i tshul du kha phye la //
analyzed: padma'i tshul du kha phye la //
translated: open them in the manner of a lotus.

original: aom ka ma la aud bha bi shr'i sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom ka ma la aud bha bi shr'i sv'ah'a /

original: padma'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'o //
analyzed: padma'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'o //
translated: This is the mantra and mudrā of the lotus.

original: rang gi dbugs las phyung nas ni //
analyzed: rang gi dbugs las phyung nas ni //
translated: Having exhaled from one's breath,

original: rdo rje mdun du rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: rdo rje mdun du rnam par bsgom //

original: lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs nas ni //
analyzed: lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs nas ni //

analyzed: sdigs mdzub g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung dkri //

original: lcags kyu yi ni rnam pa'o //
analyzed: lcags kyu yi ni rnam pa'o //
translated: in the form of a hook.

analyzed: aom badzra aam ku sha dza: rdo rje lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o // lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur byas //

original: sdigs mdzub gnyis ni dkri byas pa //
analyzed: sdigs mdzub gnyis ni dkri byas pa //
translated: wrap the two index fingers around,

original: zhags pa yi ni rnam pa'o //
analyzed: zhags pa yi ni rnam pa'o //

original: aom badzra p'a sha h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra p'a sha h'um/

original: zhags pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: zhags pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //

analyzed: ji ltar bdag nyid gzugs brnyan bzhin //

analyzed: de ltar mdun du'ang rab bsam bya //

original: lha mo brgyad ni kun rdzogs pa //
analyzed: lha mo brgyad ni kun rdzogs pa //

analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po bzhi par ro // shar du gshin rje mthar byed dngos //

original: lho ru da bzhin bgegs mthar byed //
analyzed: lho ru da bzhin bgegs mthar byed //

original: nub tu padma mthar byed pa //
analyzed: nub tu padma mthar byed pa //

original: byang du khro bo skyong ba'o //
analyzed: byang du khro bo skyong ba'o //

analyzed: lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcings //

analyzed: rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya //

original: aom badzra spho ta bam/
analyzed: aom badzra spho ta bam/

analyzed: rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the mantra and mudra of the vajra hook.

original: lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs //
analyzed: lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs //

analyzed: mthe'u chung gnyis ni sbyar bar bya // aom badzra ghande ho: rdo rje dril bu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //

original: lag pa lcags sgrog phyag rgya las //
analyzed: lag pa lcags sgrog phyag rgya las //

analyzed: sor mo dbus ma brkyang byas la //

original: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
analyzed: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /

original: aom bee ro tsa na sa m'a dhi /
analyzed: aom bee ro tsa na sa m'a dhi /

analyzed: bi shva ye ghu @179b ya ba dza bhi shee sv'ah'a /

analyzed: aom h'um h'um h'um/ ho ho ho ho ho ho /

original: hri hri hri hri sv'ah'a /
analyzed: hri hri hri hri sv'ah'a /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor nam mkha'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //

analyzed: aom t'a re tutt'a re sa ta kshi ta h'um sv'ah'a /

original: lha mo sgrol ma'i sngags so //
analyzed: lha mo sgrol ma'i sngags so //

original: aom hi li hi li ba li sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom hi li hi li ba li sv'ah'a /

original: gos dkar mo'i sngags so //
analyzed: gos dkar mo'i sngags so //

original: m'a ma k'i'i sngags so //
analyzed: m'a ma k'i'i sngags so //

analyzed: sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags so; ;sdigs mdzub gnyis dang gung mo ni //

original: ma ning yi ge bzhi pa ni //
analyzed: ma ning yi ge bzhi pa ni //

analyzed: me tog ma la sogs pa dang // sgeg mo yi ni sngags nyid yin // g-yas brkyang rkang pa yang dag gnas //

original: sdigs mdzub snying gar spyin byas nas //
analyzed: sdigs mdzub snying gar spyin byas nas //

original: dpung pa mdun nas brkyang byas nas //
analyzed: dpung pa mdun nas brkyang byas nas //

original: se gol h'um gi rnam pa dang // lhan cig tu ni sbyar byas pa //
analyzed: se gol h'um gi rnam pa dang // lhan cig tu ni sbyar byas pa //

analyzed: shar phyogs kyi sgor zhi ba yi'o //

analyzed: aom a'a karsha ya svatva dh'a tu n'a kro sv'ah'a /

original: byang du rgyas pa yi'o //
analyzed: byang du rgyas pa yi'o //

original: aom mo ha ya mo ha ya /
analyzed: aom mo ha ya mo ha ya /

original: sarba satva n'am shr'i sv'ah'a /
analyzed: sarba satva n'am shr'i sv'ah'a /

original: nub tu dbang gi'o //
analyzed: nub tu dbang gi'o //

analyzed: aom shaksha sarba dushta gh'a ta ya hri phat/

analyzed: lho ru mngon par spyod pa yi'o //

analyzed: sdigs mdzub dang / mtheb mo sbyar ba ni me tog gi sngags dang / phyag rgya'o //

analyzed: @180a *// aom dh'u pa m'a la ku le sv'ah'a /

analyzed: sor mo dbus ma bsgreng ba ni //
translated: The middle finger extended is

analyzed: bdug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //

analyzed: khu tshur bcangs nas mthe be bsgreng ba ni /

analyzed: mar me'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //

original: aom ku ru ku ru bi dza ye sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom ku ru ku ru bi dza ye sv'ah'a /

analyzed: lag pa gnyis brkyang nas dbus su sbyar ba ni gtor ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //

original: ji ltar sngon du sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: ji ltar sngon du sbyor ba yis //

original: mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya //
analyzed: mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya //

analyzed: h'um gi glu yi rnam pa yis //

original: sangs rgyas kun nas mnyes par bya //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun nas mnyes par bya //

original: lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur byas //
analyzed: lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur byas //

original: bla re'i tshul gyis bre ba dang // ba dan tshul gyis 'phyar ba dang // gdugs kyi tshul gyis dgab pa dang // cang te'u'i tshul gyis 'khrol ba dang // 'khar rnga'i tshul gyis brdung ba dang // bzhad pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang // khro bo'i stangs stabs yan lag bskyod //
analyzed: bla re'i tshul gyis bre ba dang // ba dan tshul gyis 'phyar ba dang // gdugs kyi tshul gyis dgab pa dang // cang te'u'i tshul gyis 'khrol ba dang // 'khar rnga'i tshul gyis brdung ba dang // bzhad pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang // khro bo'i stangs stabs yan lag bskyod //

analyzed: de ltar de nyid rnal 'byor pas //
translated: Thus, the yogin of reality

analyzed: glu yi mchod pa'i khyad par nyid //

analyzed: h'um h'um h'um/ bdag med rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis //

analyzed: 'byin pa'i sa bon @180b gzung byas pa //

analyzed: spyi yi rnal 'byor ston pa'o //

original: dbang po mchog gi mchod pa che //
analyzed: dbang po mchog gi mchod pa che //

original: thar pa chen po gnas chen po //
analyzed: thar pa chen po gnas chen po //
translated: The great liberation, the great abode,

original: gsang zhing de nyid gsang ba yi //
analyzed: gsang zhing de nyid gsang ba yi //
translated: The secret and the secret reality,

original: gsang ba'i bdag po dga' chen po //
analyzed: gsang ba'i bdag po dga' chen po //
translated: The lord of secrets, the great joy,

original: rnam snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: rnam snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud //

original: lus kyi rtsa ni lnga nyid las //
analyzed: lus kyi rtsa ni lnga nyid las //

original: lha dang lha min mngon par sprul //
analyzed: lha dang lha min mngon par sprul //
translated: The gods and demigods are manifested.

original: bde ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba //
analyzed: bde ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba //

original: sbyor ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud //

original: glu dang bstod pas nyer mchod nas //
analyzed: glu dang bstod pas nyer mchod nas //

original: ji ltar las la mngon bde bar //
analyzed: ji ltar las la mngon bde bar //

analyzed: rang gi sngags kyi yi ge yis //

original: phreng ba la ni bzlas par bya //
analyzed: phreng ba la ni bzlas par bya //

original: ji ltar nus pas mchod byas la //
analyzed: ji ltar nus pas mchod byas la //

original: slar yang gshegs su gsol ba'o //
analyzed: slar yang gshegs su gsol ba'o //

original: dbugs kyis bdag nyid lus bkang ste //
analyzed: dbugs kyis bdag nyid lus bkang ste //

original: lhan cig thim par bsam par bya //
analyzed: lhan cig thim par bsam par bya //

original: ji ltar rnal 'byor nam mkha' nyid //
analyzed: ji ltar rnal 'byor nam mkha' nyid //

analyzed: de ltar rnam par snang mdzad bdag /

original: ji ltar rnam par snang mdzad lha //
analyzed: ji ltar rnam par snang mdzad lha //
translated: Just as Vairocana is the deity,

original: de bzhin rgyab kyi rtsa nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin rgyab kyi rtsa nyid do //

original: ji ltar sngon gyi rtsa nyid las //
analyzed: ji ltar sngon gyi rtsa nyid las //

original: de bzhin ye shes skye ba 'di //
analyzed: de bzhin ye shes skye ba 'di //
translated: is the arising of this gnosis.

original: chu ni sgrol ma zhes su bshad //
analyzed: chu ni sgrol ma zhes su bshad //

original: me la gos dkar yang dag ldan //
analyzed: me la gos dkar yang dag ldan //

original: rlung la lha mo sangs rgyas 'di //
analyzed: rlung la lha mo sangs rgyas 'di //

analyzed: de bzhin rab mdzes m'a ma k'i // dkar po chu yi rtsa dang ni //

original: dud pa yang ni me yi gnas //
analyzed: dud pa yang ni me yi gnas //
translated: and the smoke-colored one is the abode of fire.

original: dung gi rtsa 'di rlung gi 'o //
analyzed: dung gi rtsa 'di rlung gi 'o //
translated: This conch channel is of the wind,🔽and likewise, the lotus

original: de bzhin du ni padma dang // ye shes 'byin pa yi ni rtsa //
analyzed: de bzhin du ni padma dang // ye shes 'byin pa yi ni rtsa //
translated: is the channel of the arising of gnosis.

original: lnga yi bdag nyid khyad par ni //
analyzed: lnga yi bdag nyid khyad par ni //
translated: The special fivefold

analyzed: nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang //

analyzed: gsang zhing gsang ba rab sbas pa'i //

analyzed: bskal pa bye ba stong phrag tu //

analyzed: sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bskul ba //

analyzed: sangs rgyas lam ni mthong ba 'o //

original: ye shes snang ba de bdun nyid //
analyzed: ye shes snang ba de bdun nyid //

analyzed: rlung dang rlung ni du ba 'o //

analyzed: 'di yi lce la thig nag na //

original: mgrin pa'i glo yi phyi rol rtsa //

translated: If the channel outside the throat is

analyzed: mig gi aam ba ra chad na //

analyzed: mkhas pas dkar po'i sa bon bzla //

original: sna yi ma si ka la ni //
analyzed: sna yi ma si ka la ni //

analyzed: dbugs bsdams me yi dud pa'o //

analyzed: sgong skyes ye shes bsgom pa 'o //

original: sen mo khrag ni med pa la //
analyzed: sen mo khrag ni med pa la //

analyzed: lag pa bsdus la bzlas par bya //

analyzed: rtsa dgu la ni sa bon dgu /

analyzed: skud pa dmar pos dkri bar bya //

analyzed: gnyis med gtor mar ldan pa yis //

original: nus pa yi ni mngon par mchod //
analyzed: nus pa yi ni mngon par mchod //

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas //

analyzed: tshe zad pa yi lus can ni //

analyzed: zla ba drug tu gnas par 'gyur; ;'chi ba'i mtshan ma yongs su brtag pa'i le'u zhes bya ba bya ba drug pa rdzogs so ////

analyzed: rnal 'byor bstan bcos cho ga'i rim //

analyzed: mkhas pa zla dgur kun tu gnas // skye ba skra bra la sogs ldan //

analyzed: rtsa yi brgyad pa zhes bya la //

analyzed: bdag nyid lha ni mchog yin no //

analyzed: dkar po lha mo sgrol ma 'di //

original: rdo rje sgeg mo dri med la //

analyzed: de ltar rgyab tu rab tu grags //

analyzed: mnyam pa'i cha ru de byas pas //

analyzed: re re las ni gyes pa 'o //

analyzed: stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni //

analyzed: lus po yi ni rtsa nyid do //

analyzed: sdigs mdzub snying gar sbyin byas la //

original: g-yas pa rdo rje khu tshur byas //
analyzed: g-yas pa rdo rje khu tshur byas //

original: rked pa'i phyogs su gzung byas la //
analyzed: rked pa'i phyogs su gzung byas la //
translated: Holding it at the waist,

original: 'di ni tsham ngam mchog gi rgya //
analyzed: 'di ni tsham ngam mchog gi rgya //

original: ra nag po yi pags pa la //
analyzed: ra nag po yi pags pa la //
translated: On a black goat skin,

original: dur khrod ras kyi skud pa yis //🔽zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa nyid //
analyzed: dur khrod ras kyi skud pa yis // zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa nyid //
translated: With thread from a charnel ground cloth,🔽Three faces and six arms,

original: kha dog sngon po spyan gsum pa //
analyzed: kha dog sngon po spyan gsum pa //

original: dmar po'i skra yis rnam par 'dzings //
analyzed: dmar po'i skra yis rnam par 'dzings //

original: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa nyid //
analyzed: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa nyid //

original: rgod cing mche ba gtsigs pa dang // 'bar ba'i me yis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: rgod cing mche ba gtsigs pa dang // 'bar ba'i me yis rnam par brgyan //

original: dang por mdung gi lag pa dang // gnyis par de bzhin mi mgo 'o //
analyzed: dang por mdung gi lag pa dang // gnyis par de bzhin mi mgo 'o //
translated: In the first [pair of] hands she holds a spear and a human head.

original: gsum pa la ni rdo rje gser //
analyzed: gsum pa la ni rdo rje gser //
translated: In the third [pair of] hands she holds a vajra and a golden club.

original: g-yon pa steng du sdigs mdzub dang // gnyis pa'i lag na thod pa 'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa steng du sdigs mdzub dang // gnyis pa'i lag na thod pa 'o //

original: gsum par dril bu'i sgra sgrogs shing //
analyzed: gsum par dril bu'i sgra sgrogs shing //
translated: In the third [pair of] hands she rings a bell.

original: sham thabs stag gi pags pa dang // glang chen pags pa rab tu mnabs //
analyzed: sham thabs stag gi pags pa dang // glang chen pags pa rab tu mnabs //

original: rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa ni //
analyzed: rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa ni //

original: yi dvags gdan la rab tu bzhugs //
analyzed: yi dvags gdan la rab tu bzhugs //

original: 'bar ba dmar po'i rang bzhin lus //
analyzed: 'bar ba dmar po'i rang bzhin lus //

original: gdugs dkar po ni rnam par 'phyang //
analyzed: gdugs dkar po ni rnam par 'phyang //

original: ral pa gcig pa'i srin mo ni //
analyzed: ral pa gcig pa'i srin mo ni //
translated: Ekajaṭī, the rākṣasī,

original: rdo rje pho nya mngon par bri //
analyzed: rdo rje pho nya mngon par bri //
translated: is depicted as a vajra messenger.

original: sen mos khrag ni mngon par blang //
analyzed: sen mos khrag ni mngon par blang //
translated: She is sucking blood with her nails.

original: lha mo'i lte ba bya bar gsungs //
analyzed: lha mo'i lte ba bya bar gsungs //
translated: The goddess is said to be active at the navel.

original: de yi sha yis sbyin sreg bya //
analyzed: de yi sha yis sbyin sreg bya //

original: de bzhin @188b dur khrod kyis ni bskor //
analyzed: de bzhin @188b dur khrod kyis ni bskor //

original: mgo bor aom/ mig tu h'um/
analyzed: mgo bor aom/ mig tu h'um/

original: sna la ha /🔽rna bar hri /
analyzed: sna la ha / rna bar hri /

original: lce la hra /
analyzed: lce la hra /
translated: In the tongue, Hra.🔽In the heart, Hriḥ.

original: snying gar hri:/ rdo rje khu tshur mnyam byas te //
analyzed: snying gar hri:/ rdo rje khu tshur mnyam byas te //

original: dbu ma gnyis ni rab tu brkyang //
analyzed: dbu ma gnyis ni rab tu brkyang //

analyzed: yan lag drug gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o //

original: snying gar sdigs mdzub sbyin byas la //
analyzed: snying gar sdigs mdzub sbyin byas la //

original: dpung pa g-yas pa rab tu brkyang //
analyzed: dpung pa g-yas pa rab tu brkyang //

original: h'um gi rnam pas se gol dang // lhan cig nyid du sbyar byas la //
analyzed: h'um gi rnam pas se gol dang // lhan cig nyid du sbyar byas la //
translated: With the form of Hūṃ, one should snap one’s fingers

original: g-yas brkyang ba yi rkang pas mnan //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang ba yi rkang pas mnan //

original: aom ma tha ma tha dushta h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ma tha ma tha dushta h'um phat/

analyzed: 'di ni lha mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //

original: ra sha 'o mar bsres pa yis //
analyzed: ra sha 'o mar bsres pa yis //
translated: Having mixed cow’s milk with goat’s milk,

original: dur khrod gnas pa'i lha mo la //
analyzed: dur khrod gnas pa'i lha mo la //

original: brgyad brgya ru ni dbul bya zhing //
analyzed: brgyad brgya ru ni dbul bya zhing //

original: sna tshogs mchod pas tshim byas la //
analyzed: sna tshogs mchod pas tshim byas la //

original: phyis ni las rnams brtsam par bya //
analyzed: phyis ni las rnams brtsam par bya //

original: s'a lu'i 'bras la gzugs brnyan bya //
analyzed: s'a lu'i 'bras la gzugs brnyan bya //

original: ming gi dbus su gzhag byas la //
analyzed: ming gi dbus su gzhag byas la //

original: seng ldeng phur bu sor brgyad pas //
analyzed: seng ldeng phur bu sor brgyad pas //

original: lhan cig dngos pos brdung bar bya //
analyzed: lhan cig dngos pos brdung bar bya //

original: rdo rje 'ang de ru gzhag byas na //
analyzed: rdo rje 'ang de ru gzhag byas na //

original: gcin ni mchog tu sdom par 'gyur //
analyzed: gcin ni mchog tu sdom par 'gyur //

original: ba lci las ni gzugs brnyan bya //
analyzed: ba lci las ni gzugs brnyan bya //

original: khyi yi spu yis dgang byas la //
analyzed: khyi yi spu yis dgang byas la //

original: ming ni h'um gi rnam par sbyar //
analyzed: ming ni h'um gi rnam par sbyar //

original: brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas bya zhing //
analyzed: brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas bya zhing //

original: rdo rje padmas brdung byas la //
analyzed: rdo rje padmas brdung byas la //

original: gdug pa ji bzhin 'tshe bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gdug pa ji bzhin 'tshe bar 'gyur //

original: lha dgra las ni padma bya //
analyzed: lha dgra las ni padma bya //

original: ming gi sa bon gzhug //
analyzed: ming gi sa bon gzhug //

original: gang zhig bsams pa'i bud med rnams //
analyzed: gang zhig bsams pa'i bud med rnams //

analyzed: de bzhin nges par dbang du 'gyur //

original: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //

original: rdo rje 'dzin pas slar yang gsungs @189a *//
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pas slar yang gsungs @189a *//

original: gzhan yang las kyi khyad par nyid //
analyzed: gzhan yang las kyi khyad par nyid //
translated: “Moreover, just the special activity,

original: phyag na rdo rje nyid nyon cig /
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje nyid nyon cig /

original: srog chags kyis brkos sa las ni //
analyzed: srog chags kyis brkos sa las ni //

original: blo dang ldan pas gzugs brnyan bya //
analyzed: blo dang ldan pas gzugs brnyan bya //
translated: the wise one should make an effigy.

original: lha mo'i sa bon yi ges bskor //
analyzed: lha mo'i sa bon yi ges bskor //

original: snying gar ming gi rnam par bya //
analyzed: snying gar ming gi rnam par bya //
translated: with the name in the heart.

original: rkang pa g-yon pas mnan nas ni //
analyzed: rkang pa g-yon pas mnan nas ni //

original: blo dang ldan pas brgyad brgyar bzlas //
analyzed: blo dang ldan pas brgyad brgyar bzlas //

original: sbrul gyi pags pas bkang byas na //
analyzed: sbrul gyi pags pas bkang byas na //

original: sbrul gyis rab tu gang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sbrul gyis rab tu gang bar 'gyur //

analyzed: sbal pa'i 'dab  mas bkang byas na //

original: sbal pas rab tu gang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sbal pas rab tu gang bar 'gyur //

original: til mar nag pos bkang byas na //
analyzed: til mar nag pos bkang byas na //

original: sbrang bus rab tu gang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sbrang bus rab tu gang bar 'gyur //

original: sen mo yis ni bkang byas na //
analyzed: sen mo yis ni bkang byas na //

analyzed: srin bus mngon par gang bar 'gyur // sha yis kun nas bkang byas na //
translated: it will be filled with worms.🔽Having filled it with flesh,

analyzed: mod la gzer bas yongs su 'dzin // sbyor bas 'jig par byed pa dang // slob dpon dang ni gsang dmod pa'i //

original: shin tu gdug pa'i sems can rnams //
analyzed: shin tu gdug pa'i sems can rnams //
translated: the very wrathful sentient beings of the master and the curse,

original: 'di yi lam gyis sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: 'di yi lam gyis sbyar bar bya //

original: sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro //

original: lha mo pho nya rdo rje 'chang //
analyzed: lha mo pho nya rdo rje 'chang //

original: sbyor ba bsrung ba'i don du gsungs //
analyzed: sbyor ba bsrung ba'i don du gsungs //

original: las 'di yi ni khyad par nyid //
analyzed: las 'di yi ni khyad par nyid //

original: nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang //
analyzed: nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang //

original: gdan bzhi pa dang mnyam ldan pas //
analyzed: gdan bzhi pa dang mnyam ldan pas //

original: yid mi gzhungs pas rtogs bya'i phyir //
analyzed: yid mi gzhungs pas rtogs bya'i phyir //

original: mdor bsdus sbyor ba byed pa'o //
analyzed: mdor bsdus sbyor ba byed pa'o //

original: slob mas shes pas don dam smra ba'i seng ge yis //
analyzed: slob mas shes pas don dam smra ba'i seng ge yis //

original: rnal 'byor cho gas nyon mongs g-yos pas gcad pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rnal 'byor cho gas nyon mongs g-yos pas gcad pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to cut through the afflictions that arise from the ritual of yoga,

analyzed: @189b nyon mongs sred pa'i nyes pa skye rtsa 'joms mdzad pa //

original: rnal 'byor don dam rgyal po nyid du 'grub gyur cig /
analyzed: rnal 'byor don dam rgyal po nyid du 'grub gyur cig /
translated: May one attain the state of the king of the ultimate yoga.

original: sbyor ba'i tshig gi le'u zhes bya ba bcu gcig pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: sbyor ba'i tshig gi le'u zhes bya ba bcu gcig pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The eleventh chapter, called The Chapter on the Words of Union, is complete.

original: dpal ldan shes rab dbang po sbas pa'i nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'jig rten khams su snang bar mdzad //
analyzed: dpal ldan shes rab dbang po sbas pa'i nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'jig rten khams su snang bar mdzad //
translated: The glorious lord of wisdom, hidden in the light of the sun, illuminates the world.

original: dngos po du ma'i khyad par bsags pa'i rab rib gang gi mthu yis 'jig mdzad pa; ;rtag tu kun nas rdubs pa'i nga rgyal mi mthun dgra yi dus dang dus su g-yul 'gyed pa'i //
analyzed: dngos po du ma'i khyad par bsags pa'i rab rib gang gi mthu yis 'jig mdzad pa; ;rtag tu kun nas rdubs pa'i nga rgyal mi mthun dgra yi dus dang dus su g-yul 'gyed pa'i //
translated: always engages in battle with the enemy of pride, which is constantly blowing,

original: chags pa med pa'i ye shes ri bo mnyam nyid mnyam pa'i sa bon chen po gcig gis mdzad //
analyzed: chags pa med pa'i ye shes ri bo mnyam nyid mnyam pa'i sa bon chen po gcig gis mdzad //
translated: is the one who creates the mountain of non-attached wisdom, the great seed of the equality of equanimity.

original: 'khor bar thim par gsungs pa yi //
analyzed: 'khor bar thim par gsungs pa yi //
translated: The one who is said to dissolve into samsara,

original: rtsa ba'i 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to the root wheel.

original: gsang ba'i ngo bo mnyam shes phyir //
analyzed: gsang ba'i ngo bo mnyam shes phyir //
translated: Because of knowing the equality of the essence of the secret,

original: gsang ba bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: gsang ba bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
translated: The yogi who meditates on the secret,

original: h'um gi rnam pa 'byin byed dngos //
analyzed: h'um gi rnam pa 'byin byed dngos //
translated: The actual emanator in the form of HUM,

original: h'um gi rnam pa mchog gi lha //
analyzed: h'um gi rnam pa mchog gi lha //
translated: The supreme deity in the form of HUM,

original: h'um gi rnam pa stong gyur pa //
analyzed: h'um gi rnam pa stong gyur pa //
translated: The one who becomes empty in the form of HUM,

original: yi ge h'um la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: yi ge h'um la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the syllable HUM.

original: sngon du rtsa ni kun sbyar la //
analyzed: sngon du rtsa ni kun sbyar la //
translated: First, having combined all the channels,

original: phyis ni sa bon rnam par 'phrul //
analyzed: phyis ni sa bon rnam par 'phrul //
translated: Later, the seed syllables manifest.

original: lte bar phyugs kyi zhags pa ni //
analyzed: lte bar phyugs kyi zhags pa ni //
translated: At the navel, the lasso of animals

original: phyugs kyis grol zhing shin tu grol //
analyzed: phyugs kyis grol zhing shin tu grol //
translated: Is liberated by the animal, completely liberated.

original: shar gyi phyogs su gzhu rgyal ni //
analyzed: shar gyi phyogs su gzhu rgyal ni //
translated: In the eastern direction, the bow is victorious.

original: padma yi ni dkyil 'khor nyid //
analyzed: padma yi ni dkyil 'khor nyid //
translated: The mandala of the lotus itself.

original: gsher ba yang ni nub kyi phyogs //
analyzed: gsher ba yang ni nub kyi phyogs //
translated: The wet is also in the western direction.

original: rnam par shes pa'ang lhan cig 'byin //🔽nam mkha'i dbus su bdag nyid bya //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang lhan cig 'byin // nam mkha'i dbus su bdag nyid bya //
translated: Consciousness is also emitted together.🔽One should make oneself in the middle of space.

original: bdag nyid dbus su nam mkha'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid dbus su nam mkha'o //
translated: Space is oneself in the middle.

original: gnyi ga'i dbu ma shes byas la //
analyzed: gnyi ga'i dbu ma shes byas la //
translated: Having understood the middle of both,

original: grol ba nyid du the tshom med //
analyzed: grol ba nyid du the tshom med //

original: stong pa'i dbus su bdag @190a *//🔽gi ni // bdag nyid rtags ni mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa'i dbus su bdag @190a *// gi ni // bdag nyid rtags ni mtshon pa'o //
translated: In the middle of emptiness,🔽one's own sign is indicated.

original: rtags kyi bdag nyid 'byin pa ni //
analyzed: rtags kyi bdag nyid 'byin pa ni //
translated: The emission of the nature of the sign

original: bsgoms pas sa yi 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: bsgoms pas sa yi 'byin pa'o //
translated: is emitted by the stage of meditation.

original: gzhu las rgyal zhing gsher ba nyid //
analyzed: gzhu las rgyal zhing gsher ba nyid //
translated: The bow is victorious over the wet.

original: skam po padma 'byin pa las //
analyzed: skam po padma 'byin pa las //
translated: From the emission of the dry lotus,

original: bdun cu rtsa gnyis mnyam 'byin pa //
analyzed: bdun cu rtsa gnyis mnyam 'byin pa //
translated: the seventy-two are emitted equally.

original: rtsa dgu yi ni ming 'di nyid //
analyzed: rtsa dgu yi ni ming 'di nyid //
translated: This is the name of the nine nāḍīs.

original: rtsa dgu'i sa ni rtag gyur pa //
analyzed: rtsa dgu'i sa ni rtag gyur pa //
translated: The stage of the nine nāḍīs is always

original: gsum po 'byin cing yang dag sdud //
analyzed: gsum po 'byin cing yang dag sdud //
translated: emitted and gathered into the three.

original: gsher dang skam po zhes bya ba //
analyzed: gsher dang skam po zhes bya ba //
translated: The so-called wet and dry

original: rtsa ba gzhu las rgyal ba nyid //
analyzed: rtsa ba gzhu las rgyal ba nyid //
translated: are the root of the victory over the bow.

original: dngos po yi ni mtshan nyid pa'i //🔽'di yis 'byin cing yang dag sdud //
analyzed: dngos po yi ni mtshan nyid pa'i // 'di yis 'byin cing yang dag sdud //
translated: The characteristics of the entities

original: padma dgur ni mnyam bshad pa //🔽rnam par shes pa lhan cig gnas //
analyzed: padma dgur ni mnyam bshad pa // rnam par shes pa lhan cig gnas //
translated: are explained as the nine lotuses.

original: steng 'og phyogs kyang stong pa nyid //
analyzed: steng 'og phyogs kyang stong pa nyid //
translated: The upper and lower directions are also emptiness.

original: dbu ma stong pa nyid du ni //
analyzed: dbu ma stong pa nyid du ni //
translated: In the emptiness of the central nāḍī,

original: rtag tu stong pa gsum bsgom pa //
analyzed: rtag tu stong pa gsum bsgom pa //
translated: one should always meditate on the three voids.

original: gang gis de shes mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis de shes mkhas pa'o //
translated: One who knows that is a scholar.

original: g-yon gyi glo ru ser skya dang // g-yas par nag po chen po gnas //
analyzed: g-yon gyi glo ru ser skya dang // g-yas par nag po chen po gnas //

original: rtsa lnga las ni mnyam 'byin pa //
analyzed: rtsa lnga las ni mnyam 'byin pa //

original: lnga nyid du ni sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: lnga nyid du ni sbyar bar bya //

analyzed: chu dang me dang nam mkha' dang // sa nyid bzhi ste mnyam pa'i gdan //

original: chu shing me tog lta bu ni //
analyzed: chu shing me tog lta bu ni //
translated: The flower of the plantain tree

original: lta ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas //
analyzed: lta ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas //
translated: is located in the center of the view.

original: rtag tu kha ni rab zlum pa //
analyzed: rtag tu kha ni rab zlum pa //
translated: The mouth is always completely round

original: mkhas pa yis ni rgyas par bya //
analyzed: mkhas pa yis ni rgyas par bya //
translated: and is expanded by the scholar.

original: 'dab ma brgyad par rtag tu gyur //
analyzed: 'dab ma brgyad par rtag tu gyur //
translated: It always becomes eight petals

original: gsungs pa'i ge sar dang ldan par //
analyzed: gsungs pa'i ge sar dang ldan par //
translated: with stamens as described.

original: de yi dbus su bshad pa ni //
analyzed: de yi dbus su bshad pa ni //
translated: In the center of that, it is explained,

original: rnam shes lhan cig bsgom pa ni //
analyzed: rnam shes lhan cig bsgom pa ni //

original: phra rab rdul gyi rnam pa ltar //
analyzed: phra rab rdul gyi rnam pa ltar //

original: rnam par shes pa mtshon par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mtshon par bya'o //
translated: The consciousness is indicated

original: skra @190b yi rtse mo brgya yi char //
analyzed: skra @190b yi rtse mo brgya yi char //

original: 'od zer g-yo ba med par gnas //
analyzed: 'od zer g-yo ba med par gnas //
translated: The motionless light ray abides.

original: kun nas sbyor ba gsum pas dkri //
analyzed: kun nas sbyor ba gsum pas dkri //

original: dkris pa'i mtshan nyid 'khor lo 'dra //
analyzed: dkris pa'i mtshan nyid 'khor lo 'dra //

original: rdza mkhan 'khor lo lta bur 'khor //
analyzed: rdza mkhan 'khor lo lta bur 'khor //

original: gnas su bzlog pa ye shes so //
analyzed: gnas su bzlog pa ye shes so //
translated: The wisdom is the reversal in the place.🔽The meaning of the union in the middle of the person

original: rang bzhin brgyad pa'i dbye ba yis //🔽skyes bu dbus su sbyar ba'i don //
analyzed: rang bzhin brgyad pa'i dbye ba yis // skyes bu dbus su sbyar ba'i don //
translated: is by the division of the eight natures.

original: dbus mas 'byin cing yang dag sdud //
analyzed: dbus mas 'byin cing yang dag sdud //
translated: The middle one emits and gathers

original: thams cad lta ba 'joms par byed //
analyzed: thams cad lta ba 'joms par byed //
translated: all the views.

original: rtsa brgyad mngon par kun nas ldan //🔽dkar po dud pa padma dung //
analyzed: rtsa brgyad mngon par kun nas ldan // dkar po dud pa padma dung //
translated: It is endowed with the eight roots.🔽The divisions of the eight are🔽white, smoke, lotus, conch,🔽realgar, stainless, opening,

original: gi wang dri med 'byed pa dang // sa gdugs brgyad pa'i dbye ba'o //
analyzed: gi wang dri med 'byed pa dang // sa gdugs brgyad pa'i dbye ba'o //
translated: earth, and parasol.

original: bdag med chos dang yang dag sbyor //
analyzed: bdag med chos dang yang dag sbyor //

original: bdag med pas ni rnam par dkris //
analyzed: bdag med pas ni rnam par dkris //

original: khams gsum skyes pa zad byed rnams //
analyzed: khams gsum skyes pa zad byed rnams //
translated: Those who cause the exhaustion of birth in the three realms

original: ye shes nus pa yis ni 'joms //
analyzed: ye shes nus pa yis ni 'joms //
translated: And with the power of wisdom, one conquers.

original: dang por dkar por yang dag bsgom //
analyzed: dang por dkar por yang dag bsgom //
translated: First, one should meditate on white,🔽Second, one should meditate on yellow,

original: gnyis par ser por bsgom pa dang // gsum par kun nas dmar por bsgom //
analyzed: gnyis par ser por bsgom pa dang // gsum par kun nas dmar por bsgom //
translated: Third, one should meditate on all-around red,

original: bzhi pa la ni nag po nyid //
analyzed: bzhi pa la ni nag po nyid //

original: rtsa'i 'khor lo bsgom pa ste le'u dang po zhes bya ba rdzogs so ////
analyzed: rtsa'i 'khor lo bsgom pa ste le'u dang po zhes bya ba rdzogs so ////
translated: This concludes the first chapter on the meditation of the cakras.

original: de na gzhan yang rab bshad pa; ;dkyil 'khor sa bon bsgom pa ni //
analyzed: de na gzhan yang rab bshad pa; ;dkyil 'khor sa bon bsgom pa ni //

original: sa bon nges par de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: sa bon nges par de bzhin gshegs //

original: dbyangs kyi yi ge'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi yi ge'i mtshan nyid do //

original: rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste //
analyzed: rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste //

analyzed: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol 'gro; ;dag pa'i lus kyi ngo bo yis //
translated: Crossing to the other side of the ocean of saṃsāra.

original: ye shes lus ni dag pa'i dngos //
analyzed: ye shes lus ni dag pa'i dngos //
translated: The body of wisdom is the pure entity,

original: dag cing dag pa de bzhin dngos //
analyzed: dag cing dag pa de bzhin dngos //

original: dang po'i rnal 'byor mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: dang po'i rnal 'byor mtshan nyid do //

original: de bzhin nyon mongs mun pa ni //
analyzed: de bzhin nyon mongs mun pa ni //

original: rnam @191a *// shes lhan cig snang ba'o //
analyzed: rnam @191a *// shes lhan cig snang ba'o //

original: ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas ni //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas ni //
translated: Having conquered with the vajra of wisdom,

original: snang ba la sogs thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: snang ba la sogs thob par 'gyur //
translated: One will attain the state of appearance and so forth.

original: dag pa'i lus dang sems kyis ni //
analyzed: dag pa'i lus dang sems kyis ni //

original: blo ldan dkyil 'khor mtshon par bya //
analyzed: blo ldan dkyil 'khor mtshon par bya //
translated: the wise one should draw the maṇḍala.

original: slob dpon dang bral 'di yis ni //
analyzed: slob dpon dang bral 'di yis ni //

original: rtag tu sa steng dngos grub med //
analyzed: rtag tu sa steng dngos grub med //
translated: there is never accomplishment on the surface of the earth.

original: slob dpon yon tan gzung bya zhing //
analyzed: slob dpon yon tan gzung bya zhing //

original: skyon ni nam yang ma yin no //
analyzed: skyon ni nam yang ma yin no //
