original: dkyil 'khor cho ga'i mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor cho ga'i mtshan nyid ni //

original: de bzhin mnyam par brtags la bya //
analyzed: de bzhin mnyam par brtags la bya //
translated: should be drawn in the same way.

original: grva zhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
analyzed: grva zhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
translated: The four corners are peaceful,

original: rta babs bzhi yi rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: rta babs bzhi yi rnam par brgyan //

original: de dbus padma mnyam par bri //
analyzed: de dbus padma mnyam par bri //

original: dbus su mchog gi yi ge ni //
analyzed: dbus su mchog gi yi ge ni //
translated: in the center, the supreme syllable.

original: yi ge'i gzugs dang dbyibs su ni //
analyzed: yi ge'i gzugs dang dbyibs su ni //

original: yi ge ru ni rnam shes bya //
analyzed: yi ge ru ni rnam shes bya //
translated: should be known as the syllable.

original: shar du dkar po kun nas bsam //
analyzed: shar du dkar po kun nas bsam //

original: nub tu du ba'i sa bon bzhin //
analyzed: nub tu du ba'i sa bon bzhin //

original: lhor ni dung gi sa bon dang // byang du padma'i sa bon no //
analyzed: lhor ni dung gi sa bon dang // byang du padma'i sa bon no //

original: dbang ldan mtshams su ro tsa na //
analyzed: dbang ldan mtshams su ro tsa na //

original: me ru dri med gsum 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: me ru dri med gsum 'byung ba'o //

original: bden bral du ni 'byed pa shes //
analyzed: bden bral du ni 'byed pa shes //

original: thams cad las la rlung nyid do //
analyzed: thams cad las la rlung nyid do //

analyzed: 'di ltar dkyil 'khor mnyam shes bya //

original: rtag tu dkyil 'khor bsam par bya //
analyzed: rtag tu dkyil 'khor bsam par bya //

original: dkyil 'khor bsams pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bsams pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: By merely visualizing the mandala,

original: sdig pa spangs shing rnam par grol //
analyzed: sdig pa spangs shing rnam par grol //

analyzed: rnal 'byor sbyor ba tsam gyis ni; ;bza' ba rnal 'byor brtag par bya //

original: dbang po lnga ni tshim byas pas //
analyzed: dbang po lnga ni tshim byas pas //
translated: By satisfying the five sense faculties,

original: mi 'chi mdzes par gyur pa 'o //
analyzed: mi 'chi mdzes par gyur pa 'o //

analyzed: dang por bdag nyid sbyang ba dang // gnyis par rtag tu dkyil 'khor @191b nyid; ;gsum par bdag gi gdan dang ni //

analyzed: bzhi pa la ni sbyor ba'i gdan //

analyzed: sa bon gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'i rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The second chapter of the exposition on the meditation of the seed-syllable mandala is complete.

original: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //🔽yi ge'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa // yi ge'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba //
translated: Now, I will explain something else,🔽known as the characteristics of the syllables.

analyzed: yig don dbyangs las yang dag 'byung //

original: yi ge ru ni rnam shes bya //
analyzed: yi ge ru ni rnam shes bya //

original: mgrin pa mchu dang rkan  dang ni //
analyzed: mgrin pa mchu dang rkan  dang ni //

original: yi ge lce yis yongs bsgyur pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge lce yis yongs bsgyur pa'o //

original: ka tshan dud pa las byung nyid //
analyzed: ka tshan dud pa las byung nyid //

analyzed: tsa tshan dkar po yang dag mtshungs // ta tshan dung las yang dag 'byung //

original: padma nyid las ta yi tshogs //
analyzed: padma nyid las ta yi tshogs //

original: dbyangs bzhi yi ni 'du shes su //
analyzed: dbyangs bzhi yi ni 'du shes su //

analyzed: so sor dbyangs ni 'byung ba'o //

analyzed: yi ge gnyis las kun 'byung ba //

original: dbyangs kyi yi ge dman pa nyid //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi yi ge dman pa nyid //

original: kha dog med cing kha dog 'byung //
analyzed: kha dog med cing kha dog 'byung //

original: gzugs med gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: gzugs med gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid //

original: ring ba ma yin thung ba min //
analyzed: ring ba ma yin thung ba min //

original: rigs pa dang ni rigs min nyid //
analyzed: rigs pa dang ni rigs min nyid //

original: stong min stong pa'i yang dag dngos //
analyzed: stong min stong pa'i yang dag dngos //

original: gang gis de shes mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis de shes mkhas pa'o //

original: gzugs dang stong pa de bzhin dbus //
analyzed: gzugs dang stong pa de bzhin dbus //

original: blo dang ldan pas gzung bar bya //
analyzed: blo dang ldan pas gzung bar bya //

original: srog gi yer lhan cig bas //
analyzed: srog gi yer lhan cig bas //

analyzed: ji lta gzugs don mdzes pa dang // yid 'ong 'od zer yi ge ni //

original: dus las 'das pa phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: dus las 'das pa phyag 'tshal 'dud //

original: stong pa dang ni padma rgyal //
analyzed: stong pa dang ni padma rgyal //

original: padma dkar po'i yi ge ni //
analyzed: padma dkar po'i yi ge ni //

original: de bzhin gang shes rnal 'byor ba //
analyzed: de bzhin gang shes rnal 'byor ba //
translated: the one who knows in the same way, the yogin,

original: sbyor ba'i gdan gyi ming nyid yin //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i gdan gyi ming nyid yin //

original: stong pas lus ni sbyang byas la //
analyzed: stong pas lus ni sbyang byas la //

analyzed: @192a *// stong pa nyid du lhan cig bskrun //

original: sa bon bskrun pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: sa bon bskrun pa tsam gyis ni //

analyzed: yi ge'i mtshan nyid lhan cig go /

analyzed: yi ge'i mtshan nyid rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba ste le'u gsum pa rdzogs so ////
translated: This concludes the third chapter on the characteristics of the syllables.

analyzed: bardzun gyi tshig ni mi smra ste //

analyzed: bardzun du smra bar rab goms pas //
translated: because of being very familiar with false speech,

original: bslab pa thams cad rnam par mnan //
analyzed: bslab pa thams cad rnam par mnan //

analyzed: nyes pa thams cad kun gyi gnas //

original: chags pa'i thag pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: chags pa'i thag pa'i rang bzhin gyis //

analyzed: 'khor ba'i phur pa la rab btags //

original: mi gtsang bum pa'i mar lta bu //
analyzed: mi gtsang bum pa'i mar lta bu //

original: thams cad du ni rtag tu spang //
analyzed: thams cad du ni rtag tu spang //

analyzed: lus kyi rnam pa gsum nyid dang // ngag gi yang ni rnam pa bzhi //

original: yid kyi rnam pa gsum nyid ni //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam pa gsum nyid ni //
translated: And the three types of mental [action],

original: mkhas pa yis ni rtag tu bsdam //
analyzed: mkhas pa yis ni rtag tu bsdam //

original: ngag gi mchod pa mngon rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: ngag gi mchod pa mngon rdzogs pa'o //

original: de nyid dman pa'i sgrub pa pos //
analyzed: de nyid dman pa'i sgrub pa pos //

analyzed: bsgrub bya 'grub par mi 'gyur bas // rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid kyis //
translated: Will not accomplish the object of attainment.🔽Therefore, by the characteristics of yoga and union,

original: de phyir de nyid la mnyam brten //
analyzed: de phyir de nyid la mnyam brten //

original: bla ma bsnyen bkur bsten la rig /
analyzed: bla ma bsnyen bkur bsten la rig /

original: ci 'byor pa yi rdzas nyid dang // yang na rig dang rig par brje //
analyzed: ci 'byor pa yi rdzas nyid dang // yang na rig dang rig par brje //
translated: Or else with knowledge and knowledge-mantra,

original: bzhi pa nye bar rnyed mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bzhi pa nye bar rnyed mi 'gyur //
translated: The fourth will not be obtained.🔽On the fourteenth, fifteenth,

analyzed: bcu bzhi dang ni bco lnga dang // khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la //
translated: And especially the eighth day,

original: dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas //

original: 'bad pas gtor ma sbyin par bya //
analyzed: 'bad pas gtor ma sbyin par bya //

original: bdun gyi sde tshan tsa mundi /
analyzed: bdun gyi sde tshan tsa mundi /

original: khro gnyer can la nyi shu lnga //
analyzed: khro gnyer can la nyi shu lnga //

analyzed: sde tshan brgyad pa m'a ma k'i // sgrol ma sde tshan lnga par bshad //

original: mkha' 'gro ma yang @192b lnga par bshad //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yang @192b lnga par bshad //

original: 'byung ba sdud pa drug pa'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba sdud pa drug pa'o //
translated: The sixth is the gathering of the elements.

original: ri khrod ma ni dgu par bshad //
analyzed: ri khrod ma ni dgu par bshad //

original: sangs rgyas spyan ma bco brgyad de //
analyzed: sangs rgyas spyan ma bco brgyad de //

original: rnal 'byor ma ni brgyad cu nyid //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni brgyad cu nyid //

original: phyi yi mchod pas mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: phyi yi mchod pas mtshungs pa'o //
translated: They are equal to the outer offerings.

original: dbus su bde ba chen por bshad //
analyzed: dbus su bde ba chen por bshad //
translated: In the center is explained as great bliss.

analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni brgyad kyis bskor // ha yi rnam pa kha dog 'phrog /
translated: It is surrounded by the eight yoginīs.🔽The form of haṃ is the color-stealer.

original: ha yi rnam pa dri ma med //
analyzed: ha yi rnam pa dri ma med //
translated: The form of haṃ is stainless.

original: dpa' bo hr'i: yis 'joms pa ni //
analyzed: dpa' bo hr'i: yis 'joms pa ni //
translated: The hero hṛīḥ is the conqueror.

original: rim pa 'di ltar shes par bya //
analyzed: rim pa 'di ltar shes par bya //
translated: One should know the stages in this way.🔽Some have the nature of scent,

original: kha cig dri yi rang bzhin dang // kha cig me tog gi rang bzhin //
analyzed: kha cig dri yi rang bzhin dang // kha cig me tog gi rang bzhin //
translated: some have the nature of flowers,🔽some have the nature of incense,

original: kha cig spos kyi rang bzhin dang // kha cig gtor ma'i rang bzhin du //
analyzed: kha cig spos kyi rang bzhin dang // kha cig gtor ma'i rang bzhin du //
translated: and some have the nature of torma.

original: de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' brgyad //
analyzed: de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' brgyad //
translated: Likewise, the eight bodhisattvas

original: phyi yi mchod par gnas pa nyid //
analyzed: phyi yi mchod par gnas pa nyid //
translated: are present as the outer offerings.

original: dam tshig dang / gtor ma dang / mchod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: dam tshig dang / gtor ma dang / mchod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa rdzogs so ////
translated: Chapter 4 is complete.

original: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
translated: Now, moreover, I will explain

original: yi ge las kyi mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: yi ge las kyi mtshan nyid ni //
translated: the characteristics of the syllables of action,

original: rang bzhin mnyam par bshad pa nyid //
analyzed: rang bzhin mnyam par bshad pa nyid //
translated: which are explained to be the same in nature,

original: khyad par nyid du sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: khyad par nyid du sbyar bar bya //
translated: and should be applied in particular.

original: aom ni lte bar mngon par dgang //
analyzed: aom ni lte bar mngon par dgang //
translated: Oṃ is fully emitted at the navel.

original: aom ni rang bzhin med pa nyid //
analyzed: aom ni rang bzhin med pa nyid //
translated: Oṃ is the very absence of intrinsic nature.

original: aom ni gzung 'dzin dang bral ba //
analyzed: aom ni gzung 'dzin dang bral ba //

original: aom ni stong pa nyid du bshad //

analyzed: mngal na gnas pa'i rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun pa rdzogs so ////

analyzed: ri mo can ni ri dvags cha //
translated: and the citrakā is of animal caste.

original: le'u brgyad @200a *//
analyzed: le'u brgyad @200a *//

original: pa'o;; ;;mir skyes pa ni kun sbyor bas //
analyzed: pa'o;; ;;mir skyes pa ni kun sbyor bas //
translated: The human birth is the union of

analyzed: sngon du rigs kyi cha nyid ni //

original: ba da ba ni glang por bshad //
analyzed: ba da ba ni glang por bshad //
translated: The cow is explained as the elephant,

original: yi dvags can ma rtsa yi rigs //
analyzed: yi dvags can ma rtsa yi rigs //
translated: the ghost is the root family,

original: ba da ba ni lha yi rigs //
analyzed: ba da ba ni lha yi rigs //
translated: the cow is the divine family,

original: gdugs ltar dpung pa mgrin pa ring //
analyzed: gdugs ltar dpung pa mgrin pa ring //
translated: the umbrella is the long shoulder and neck,🔽the teeth are the oily lips,

original: so sto mchu ni snum pa dang // padma 'am ni dmar po'i rigs //
analyzed: so sto mchu ni snum pa dang // padma 'am ni dmar po'i rigs //
translated: the lotus or red family,

original: dpral ba smin ma rgya che zhing //
analyzed: dpral ba smin ma rgya che zhing //
translated: the forehead and eyebrows are wide,🔽the hair is soft and yellowish,

original: skra ni 'jam zhing ser skya'o; ;gzugs ni 'tsham zhing rje ngar ring //
analyzed: skra ni 'jam zhing ser skya'o; ;gzugs ni 'tsham zhing rje ngar ring //
translated: the body is suitable, the calves are long,🔽the nose is high, the nose is narrow,

original: sna mtho sna ni 'phrang ba dang // yan lag 'jam zhing dpung pa ring //
analyzed: sna mtho sna ni 'phrang ba dang // yan lag 'jam zhing dpung pa ring //

original: ngang pa'i 'gros dang ngang pa'i skad //
analyzed: ngang pa'i 'gros dang ngang pa'i skad //

analyzed: dri dang me tog la dga' zhing //

analyzed: 'o ma la dga' sbyin pa gtong //

original: bsod nams che dang sgeg par bcas //
analyzed: bsod nams che dang sgeg par bcas //
translated: the great merit is endowed with charm,

original: dbang phyug dpal ni rab ster zhing //
analyzed: dbang phyug dpal ni rab ster zhing //

original: sems brtan kha zas nyung dus 'tsho //
analyzed: sems brtan kha zas nyung dus 'tsho //

original: le'u dang po zhes bya ba'o;; ;;de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
analyzed: le'u dang po zhes bya ba'o;; ;;de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
translated: Now, moreover, the explanation:

original: glang po can ma lus bong che //
analyzed: glang po can ma lus bong che //
translated: The elephant-like one has a large body,

original: byin par ring zhing ngo gdong che //
analyzed: byin par ring zhing ngo gdong che //
translated: long arms, a large face,

original: mig phra rna ba 'phyang ba dang // skra rtsub pa dang bum pa can //
analyzed: mig phra rna ba 'phyang ba dang // skra rtsub pa dang bum pa can //

original: mchu 'phyang yan lag rgyas pa nyid //
analyzed: mchu 'phyang yan lag rgyas pa nyid //

original: zas ni drag tu za ba dang // zhib ma'i gdong can rna ba 'phyang //
analyzed: zas ni drag tu za ba dang // zhib ma'i gdong can rna ba 'phyang //
translated: She eats food with force, has a small face, and hanging ears.

original: 'dod pa chung zhing 'dus la dga'//🔽dpung mgo ras 'phyang yan lag phra //
analyzed: 'dod pa chung zhing 'dus la dga'// dpung mgo ras 'phyang yan lag phra //
translated: She has few desires and enjoys gatherings.🔽Her shoulders hang down, and her limbs are thin.

original: skra ring so ni sto ba dang // sen mo chung zhing rkang pa 'jam //
analyzed: skra ring so ni sto ba dang // sen mo chung zhing rkang pa 'jam //
translated: Her hair is long, her teeth are even, her nails are small, and her feet are soft.

original: sna dang lto ba ring pa dang // phub ma'i skad dang lus po rtsub //
analyzed: sna dang lto ba ring pa dang // phub ma'i skad dang lus po rtsub //
translated: Her nose and belly are long, her voice is hoarse, and her body is rough.

original: 'dod la dga' zhing gti mug dngos //
analyzed: 'dod la dga' zhing gti mug dngos //
translated: She delights in sex and is truly deluded.

original: @200b phyug cing thams cad bdag po 'o //
analyzed: @200b phyug cing thams cad bdag po 'o //

original: le'u gnyis pa zhes bya ba'o ////
analyzed: le'u gnyis pa zhes bya ba'o ////

original: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
translated: Now, moreover, the explanation:

original: ri dvags can ma ri dvags rkang //
analyzed: ri dvags can ma ri dvags rkang //
translated: The deer-like one has deer legs,

original: mig dkyus ring zhing lus bong che //
analyzed: mig dkyus ring zhing lus bong che //
translated: Long eyes and a large body,🔽Fine hair and small teeth,

original: skra phra so ni chung ba dang // mchu bsnyung lus ni mdzes pa dang // til gyi bzhin dvang pags pa srab //
analyzed: skra phra so ni chung ba dang // mchu bsnyung lus ni mdzes pa dang // til gyi bzhin dvang pags pa srab //
translated: Thin lips and a beautiful body, a face like a sesame flower and thin skin,

original: mang la dga' zhing mang du smra //
analyzed: mang la dga' zhing mang du smra //
translated: Delighting in many things and speaking much,

original: bya rog skad dang rkang pa 'gyur //
analyzed: bya rog skad dang rkang pa 'gyur //
translated: With a voice like a crow and unsteady feet,

original: rtag tu dbul zhing mi brtan pa //🔽gdug sems ldan pa'i bdag nyid can //
analyzed: rtag tu dbul zhing mi brtan pa // gdug sems ldan pa'i bdag nyid can //
translated: Always poor and unstable,🔽With a malicious nature,

original: sdig byed tshig 'dong smra ba'i sa //
analyzed: sdig byed tshig 'dong smra ba'i sa //
translated: A person who speaks harsh words and is sinful,

original: dud 'gro 'am yang na yi dvags rigs //
analyzed: dud 'gro 'am yang na yi dvags rigs //
translated: Will be born as an animal or a preta.

original: le'u gsum pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: le'u gsum pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the third chapter.

original: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
translated: Now, I will explain something else:🔽Skilled, diligent, steadfast,

original: mkhas shing brtson 'grus brtan pa dang // shes rab brtul zhugs brtan pa nyid //
analyzed: mkhas shing brtson 'grus brtan pa dang // shes rab brtul zhugs brtan pa nyid //
translated: Wise and firm in discipline,

original: snying stobs brtan zhing stong pa nyid //
analyzed: snying stobs brtan zhing stong pa nyid //
translated: Courageous and steadfast in emptiness,

original: mgrin pa bum pa 'dra ba nyid //
analyzed: mgrin pa bum pa 'dra ba nyid //
translated: With a neck like a vase,

original: lus po 'tsham zhing yan lag phra //
analyzed: lus po 'tsham zhing yan lag phra //
translated: A well-proportioned body and slender limbs,

original: pags pa srab cing sen mo dmar //
analyzed: pags pa srab cing sen mo dmar //
translated: Thin skin and red nails,

original: snyan par smra zhing snying rje che //
analyzed: snyan par smra zhing snying rje che //
translated: Speaking pleasantly and with great compassion,

original: sbyin pa'i bdag nyid la rtag dga'//
analyzed: sbyin pa'i bdag nyid la rtag dga'//
translated: Always delight in the lord of generosity.

original: me tog dri la dga' ba nyid //
analyzed: me tog dri la dga' ba nyid //
translated: Delight in the fragrance of flowers,

original: sbyor dang ye shes la dga' ba //
analyzed: sbyor dang ye shes la dga' ba //
translated: Delight in union and wisdom,

original: snying rjer mngon dga'i bdag nyid sems //
analyzed: snying rjer mngon dga'i bdag nyid sems //
translated: The mind that delights in compassion.

original: bud med las ni khyad par 'phags //
analyzed: bud med las ni khyad par 'phags //
translated: Superior to women,

original: le'u bzhi pa zhes bya ba'o ////
analyzed: le'u bzhi pa zhes bya ba'o ////
translated: Chapter Four is called The Superior One.🔽Delight in the wine-bearer,

original: chang ma mngon du dga' ba dang // rtag sred la ni dga' ba yi //
analyzed: chang ma mngon du dga' ba dang // rtag sred la ni dga' ba yi //
translated: Always delight in craving,

original: rtag tu sa steng sbyor ba dman //
analyzed: rtag tu sa steng sbyor ba dman //
translated: Always inferior in union on the earth.

original: 'di lta bu ni /
analyzed: 'di lta bu ni /
translated: Such as this,

original: spang bar bya //
analyzed: spang bar bya //
translated: One should abandon.

original: le'u lnga pa zhes bya ba'o ////
analyzed: le'u lnga pa zhes bya ba'o ////
translated: Chapter Five is called The Abandoner.

original: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
translated: Then, furthermore, I will explain

original: thab khung thab khung mnyam @201a *//
analyzed: thab khung thab khung mnyam @201a *//
translated: The hearth is known as the equal hearth,

original: shes bya // ku ru me ni kun tu brtags //
analyzed: shes bya // ku ru me ni kun tu brtags //
translated: The Kuru is imagined everywhere.

original: rtsa ba'i 'khor lo padma mnyam //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i 'khor lo padma mnyam //
translated: The root wheel is equal to the lotus,

original: du ba mer ni rab tu brtag /🔽dkar ba'i sa bon gyis ni shing //🔽dung gi sa bon me tog bzhin //
analyzed: du ba mer ni rab tu brtag / dkar ba'i sa bon gyis ni shing // dung gi sa bon me tog bzhin //
translated: Smoke is imagined in the fire.🔽By the seed of the white tree,🔽The conch seed is like a flower.

original: gtor ma spos ni padmar bshad //
analyzed: gtor ma spos ni padmar bshad //
translated: The bali incense is explained as the lotus.

original: khams lnga nye bar longs spyod bya //
analyzed: khams lnga nye bar longs spyod bya //
translated: Enjoy the five elements.

original: gi wang dri ma gsum byed pa //
analyzed: gi wang dri ma gsum byed pa //
translated: The three stains of the cow's bile,

original: sa gdugs 'byin byed sa bon bzhin //
analyzed: sa gdugs 'byin byed sa bon bzhin //
translated: Like a seed that produces a sprout.

original: srin lag mthe bong gung mo ni //
analyzed: srin lag mthe bong gung mo ni //
translated: The ring finger, thumb, and middle finger

original: lhan cig phyag rgyar sbyar byas la //
analyzed: lhan cig phyag rgyar sbyar byas la //
translated: Should be joined together in a mudra.

original: bdud rtsi'i yi ge'i ngo bo yis //
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i yi ge'i ngo bo yis //
translated: With the essence of the syllable of nectar,

original: bdag nyid mchod sbyin sreg par byed //
analyzed: bdag nyid mchod sbyin sreg par byed //
translated: One should offer oneself into the fire.

original: bsreg rdzas 'o ma btung ba 'o //
analyzed: bsreg rdzas 'o ma btung ba 'o //
translated: The burnt offering is the drink of milk.

original: bco lnga dang ni bcu bzhi la //
analyzed: bco lnga dang ni bcu bzhi la //
translated: On the fifteenth and the fourteenth,

original: khyad par du yang tshes brgyad la //
analyzed: khyad par du yang tshes brgyad la //
translated: And especially on the eighth day,

original: mnyam par sbyor bas cha spangs la //
analyzed: mnyam par sbyor bas cha spangs la //
translated: One should abandon the parts of union

original: bdag bzhin bla ma sbyin sreg bya //
analyzed: bdag bzhin bla ma sbyin sreg bya //
translated: And offer the burnt offering like oneself.

original: de bzhin lha 'joms ji lta bar //
analyzed: de bzhin lha 'joms ji lta bar //
translated: Just as one would destroy a god,

original: yang na gsang ba 'jig byed pa //
analyzed: yang na gsang ba 'jig byed pa //
translated: Or destroy the secret,

original: yang na bla ma mnyes par yang //
analyzed: yang na bla ma mnyes par yang //
translated: Or please the guru,🔽In the same way, one should take the guru,

original: de bzhin bla ma blangs pa dang // cho ga rdzogs par blang ba dang // bdag nyid me la lhan cig sbyar //
analyzed: de bzhin bla ma blangs pa dang // cho ga rdzogs par blang ba dang // bdag nyid me la lhan cig sbyar //
translated: Take the complete ritual, and offer oneself into the fire.

original: rnal 'byor pa yis sdig 'joms par //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis sdig 'joms par //
translated: The yogi will destroy evil

original: 'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med //
analyzed: 'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med //
translated: In this there is no doubt.

original: le'u drug pa zhes bya ba'o ////
analyzed: le'u drug pa zhes bya ba'o ////
translated: This is the sixth chapter.

original: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
translated: Now, I will explain something else:

original: phyag rgya yi ni cho ga mchog /
analyzed: phyag rgya yi ni cho ga mchog /
translated: This is the supreme ritual of the seal.

original: g-yas brkyang rkang pas mnan nas ni //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang rkang pas mnan nas ni //
translated: With the right leg extended,

original: sdigs mdzub snying gar rnam par sbyin //
analyzed: sdigs mdzub snying gar rnam par sbyin //
translated: one should make the threatening gesture at the heart.

original: rnal 'byor pa yis sdig 'joms par //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis sdig 'joms par //
translated: The yogin will destroy evil

original: 'gyur bar 'di la the tshom med //
analyzed: 'gyur bar 'di la the tshom med //
translated: without a doubt.🔽The snapping of the fingers in the form of hūṃ

original: se gol h'um gi rnam pa dang // lhan cig tu ni sbyar byas bas //🔽@201b klu rnams skrag par byed pa dang / log 'dren 'dar bar byed pa dang / sgo 'phar 'byed pa dang / 'byung po gsod pa dang / sha za 'dul ba dang / yi dvags skrod pa dang / 'di ni tsham ngam gyi cho ga'i sngags dang /
analyzed: se gol h'um gi rnam pa dang // lhan cig tu ni sbyar byas bas // @201b klu rnams skrag par byed pa dang / log 'dren 'dar bar byed pa dang / sgo 'phar 'byed pa dang / 'byung po gsod pa dang / sha za 'dul ba dang / yi dvags skrod pa dang / 'di ni tsham ngam gyi cho ga'i sngags dang /
translated: is applied together with this.🔽This is the mantra and the seal of the ritual of threatening.

original: phyag rgya'o // gzhan yang rdo rje tsham ngam gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas mi brlag par byed pa dang / steng du 'phen pa dang / 'byung po 'joms pa la du ba'i sa bon gyis rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya'o // gzhan yang rdo rje tsham ngam gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas mi brlag par byed pa dang / steng du 'phen pa dang / 'byung po 'joms pa la du ba'i sa bon gyis rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Moreover, with the mantra and the seal of the vajra threatening, one should apply the seed of smoke for protection, for throwing upwards, and for destroying bhūtas.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas spyan drang par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas spyan drang par bya'o //
translated: The supramundane bodhisattva should be invoked with the vajra hook gesture.

original: padma'i gdan dbul /
analyzed: padma'i gdan dbul /
translated: Offer a lotus seat.

original: 'jig rten pa yi gnas tsam ni //🔽dung ba'i lcags kyus spyan drangs la //🔽rdo rje zhags pas bcing bar bya //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa yi gnas tsam ni // dung ba'i lcags kyus spyan drangs la // rdo rje zhags pas bcing bar bya //
translated: The mere abode of the mundane🔽is invoked with the conch hook,🔽bound with the vajra noose,

original: rdo rje lcags sgrog gis dgyes bya //
analyzed: rdo rje lcags sgrog gis dgyes bya //
translated: delighted with the vajra chain,

original: rdo rje dril bus mchod par bya //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bus mchod par bya //
translated: and worshipped with the vajra bell.

original: me tog gi sor mo dang // dri'i sor mo dang / sbos kyi sor mo dang / mar me'i sor mo dang / gtor ma'i sor mo rnams kyis mchod pa lnga mnyam par byas te mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: me tog gi sor mo dang // dri'i sor mo dang / sbos kyi sor mo dang / mar me'i sor mo dang / gtor ma'i sor mo rnams kyis mchod pa lnga mnyam par byas te mchod par bya'o //
translated: With the flower finger-breadth, the fragrance finger-breadth, the incense finger-breadth, the lamp finger-breadth, and the food finger-breadth, one should make the five offerings equally and worship.

original: ra ba'i phyag rgya dang / dra ba'i phyag rgya dang / phur pa'i phyag rgya dang / autpa la'i phyag rgya dang / shag ti'i phyag rgya dang / padma'i phyag rgyas rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: ra ba'i phyag rgya dang / dra ba'i phyag rgya dang / phur pa'i phyag rgya dang / autpa la'i phyag rgya dang / shag ti'i phyag rgya dang / padma'i phyag rgyas rgyas pa'o //
translated: The extensive [worship] is with the fence gesture, the net gesture, the spike gesture, the utpala gesture, the śakti gesture, and the lotus gesture.

original: chu'i sbyin sreg gi phyag rgya dang / me la padma'i phyag rgya dang / rdo rje gri gug gis gcod pa dang / log pa'i gri gug gis gsod pa dang / phag mo'i phyag rgyas skrod pa dang / snying gar bsdu zhing gshegs su gsol ba'o //🔽phyag rgya'i le'u zhes bya ba ste @202a *//
analyzed: chu'i sbyin sreg gi phyag rgya dang / me la padma'i phyag rgya dang / rdo rje gri gug gis gcod pa dang / log pa'i gri gug gis gsod pa dang / phag mo'i phyag rgyas skrod pa dang / snying gar bsdu zhing gshegs su gsol ba'o // phyag rgya'i le'u zhes bya ba ste @202a *//
translated: the mudrā of the water offering, the mudrā of the lotus in the fire, the cutting with the vajra knife, the killing with the inverted knife, the expulsion with the mudrā of the sow, and the dissolution at the heart and request for departure.🔽This concludes the chapter on mudrās,

original: le'u bdun pa zhes bya'o ////
analyzed: le'u bdun pa zhes bya'o ////
translated: the seventh in the glorious tantra of Caṇḍa­mahā­roṣaṇa called “The Sole Hero.”

original: kye ma'o 'du byed rnams mi rtag /
analyzed: kye ma'o 'du byed rnams mi rtag /
translated: Alas! Conditioned things are impermanent,

original: skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin //
analyzed: skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin //
translated: they have the nature of arising and ceasing.🔽Therefore, one should abandon desire,

original: des na de bzhin 'dod pa spang bar bya; ;'dod pa rnams ni dug ltar nyes mtha' yas //
analyzed: des na de bzhin 'dod pa spang bar bya; ;'dod pa rnams ni dug ltar nyes mtha' yas //
translated: desire is like poison, with endless faults.

original: dmyal bar ltung zhing yi dvags gnas su skye //
analyzed: dmyal bar ltung zhing yi dvags gnas su skye //
translated: One falls into hell, and is born in the realm of hungry ghosts.

original: skad cig dbang du mi 'gyur 'dod pa yi //
analyzed: skad cig dbang du mi 'gyur 'dod pa yi //
translated: Desire is not under one’s control for a moment.🔽These qualities are like a mirage,

original: yon tan 'di dag smig rgyu lta bu dang; ;snying po med cing chu bur dbu bar mtshungs //
analyzed: yon tan 'di dag smig rgyu lta bu dang; ;snying po med cing chu bur dbu bar mtshungs //
translated: without essence, equal to a water bubble.

original: thog ma lang tsho mchog gi gzugs 'dzin pa //
analyzed: thog ma lang tsho mchog gi gzugs 'dzin pa //
translated: First, one has the form of supreme youth,

original: sdug cing yid 'ong 'di ni byis pa'i dus //
analyzed: sdug cing yid 'ong 'di ni byis pa'i dus //
translated: This one, dear and pleasing, is in childhood.

original: gzugs mdzes gzugs ni mi sdug gzugs su 'gyur //
analyzed: gzugs mdzes gzugs ni mi sdug gzugs su 'gyur //
translated: The beautiful form becomes an ugly form.

original: mdza' med 'chi dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba yi //
analyzed: mdza' med 'chi dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba yi //
translated: Without a friend, it becomes like death.

original: 'gro 'di nor gyis dbul zhing slong mo pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro 'di nor gyis dbul zhing slong mo pa'o //
translated: This world is poor and begging with wealth.

original: de phyir 'bad pas rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: de phyir 'bad pas rnal 'byor pas //
translated: Therefore, with effort, the yogi

original: thams cad du ni lus bsdam zhing //
analyzed: thams cad du ni lus bsdam zhing //
translated: should always restrain the body

original: bza' ba bca' ba bsdams par bya'o //
analyzed: bza' ba bca' ba bsdams par bya'o //
translated: and control food and drink.

original: spyod pa'i dus la 'di yis bsdam //
analyzed: spyod pa'i dus la 'di yis bsdam //
translated: At the time of practice, it is restrained.

original: le'u brgyad pa ste bstan bcos bzhi pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so ////
analyzed: le'u brgyad pa ste bstan bcos bzhi pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so ////
translated: The eighth chapter, called The Fourth Treatise, is complete.

original: sor brgyad las ni lhag pa ru //
analyzed: sor brgyad las ni lhag pa ru //
translated: From eight finger breadths

original: ji srid khru stong bar du ni //
analyzed: ji srid khru stong bar du ni //
translated: up to one thousand cubits,🔽the eighth is for conquering enemies,

original: brgyad pa dgra ni 'joms pa dang // bcu par rtag tu rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: brgyad pa dgra ni 'joms pa dang // bcu par rtag tu rgyas pa'o //
translated: and the tenth is always for prosperity.

original: bcu gnyis dbang du yang dag ldan //
analyzed: bcu gnyis dbang du yang dag ldan //
translated: The twelfth is endowed with power,

original: bcu bzhi de bzhin zhi bar di //
analyzed: bcu bzhi de bzhin zhi bar di //
translated: the fourteenth is likewise for peace,

original: bcu drug tu ni kun tu brko //
analyzed: bcu drug tu ni kun tu brko //
translated: and the sixteenth is for complete digging.

original: kha khyer gsum bar mngon par spyod //
analyzed: kha khyer gsum bar mngon par spyod //
translated: One should perform the rite up to the third parapet.

original: bzhi pa la ni gru bzhi pa //
analyzed: bzhi pa la ni gru bzhi pa //
translated: The fourth is square,

original: yongs su dgod pa dbang du ldan //
analyzed: yongs su dgod pa dbang du ldan //
translated: and the consecration is the powerful one.

analyzed: yang na rgyas pa la yang @202b yin; ;dang por sa ni sbyang bar bya //

original: badzra spho ta ma h'a te dza h'um phat/
analyzed: badzra spho ta ma h'a te dza h'um phat/

original: rdo rje'i phur bu la hr'i:ha ha zhes so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i phur bu la hr'i:ha ha zhes so //

analyzed: rdo rje'i ra ba la ni ha zhes dang // rdo rje'i cho ga la ni he he 'o //
translated: In the vajra fence, HA, and in the vajra ritual, HE HE.

analyzed: ce sbyang ba la ni sa'o; ;lag pa sbyang ba la ni a'a:h'um ngo //
translated: In the purification of the site, SA. In the purification of the hands, ĀḤ HŪṀ.

analyzed: rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i bdag nyid kyis ni dgod pa'o //

original: me yi dbus su padma nyid //
analyzed: me yi dbus su padma nyid //
translated: In the middle of the fire, a lotus,

original: de yi dbus su me yi lhar //
analyzed: de yi dbus su me yi lhar //

analyzed: du ba'i lcags kyus gzhug byas la; ;rdo rje zhags pas bcing bar bya //

original: zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa nyid //
analyzed: zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa nyid //

analyzed: spyan gsum de bzhin lto ba dang // ral pa dmar ser yang dag ldan //

original: bu ram mdog can gsus  pa 'phyang //
analyzed: bu ram mdog can gsus  pa 'phyang //
translated: He is the color of molasses, with a protruding belly.

analyzed: skyabs sbyin dang ni dbyug pa dang // sdigs mdzub dang ni rtse gsum nyid // aom sa sv'ah'a me'i snying po'o //

analyzed: aom hu ta h'um ta bha he sa sv'ah'a /

original: nor gyi phyag rgyas mchod par bya //
analyzed: nor gyi phyag rgyas mchod par bya //

original: dngos po lnga yis de bzhin bsreg /
analyzed: dngos po lnga yis de bzhin bsreg /
translated: One should offer with the five things, as is the case.🔽 One should worship with the three, as is the case.

analyzed: ji ltar 'byor pa gsum gyis mchod // gang phyir de ni gshegs su gsol //

original: de bzhin padmar bsgyur ba lngas //
analyzed: de bzhin padmar bsgyur ba lngas //

analyzed: aom ka ma la aatpa lo hr'i:lha nyid rtsa dang lhan cig bzhin //

analyzed: sgra yis lha ni dbyung bya ba //

original: zhi ba dkar por yang dag ldan //
analyzed: zhi ba dkar por yang dag ldan //

original: rgyas par ser por rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: rgyas par ser por rnam par bsgom //

original: dbang la dmar po yang dag ldan //
analyzed: dbang la dmar po yang dag ldan //

original: nag po nyid ni drag po'o //
analyzed: nag po nyid ni drag po'o //

analyzed: aom 'o ma sbyang pa'o //
translated: The yoga of the seat of union, the yoga of the purification of the fuel, the purification of the fire, the purification of the oblation, the purification of the ladle, the purification of the spoon, the purification of the water for the face, the purification of the water for the feet, the purification of the water for sprinkling, the purification of the water for the mouth, the purification of the water for the feet, the purification of the water for the mouth, the purification of the water for the feet, the purification of the water for the mouth, the purification of the water for the feet, the purification of the water for the mouth, the purification of the water for the feet, the purification of the water for the mouth, the purification of the water for the feet, the purification of the water for the mouth, the purification of the water for the feet, the purification of the water for the mouth, the purification of the water for the feet, the purification of the water for the mouth, the purification of the water for the feet, the purification of the water for the mouth, the purification of the water for the feet, the purification of the water for the mouth, the purification of the water for the feet, the purification of the water for the mouth, the purification of the water for the feet, the purification of the water for the mouth, the

original: hri dri yi'o //
analyzed: hri dri yi'o //
translated: Om, O goddess, I offer you this perfume.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this food.

analyzed: aom @203a *// shu su bi ta pushpe bhyo sv'ah'a / aom dhu pa m'a la ku le sv'ah'a /
translated: Om, O goddess, I offer you this drink.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this music.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this flower.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this incense.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this lamp.

original: aom t'i kasha n'a di be sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom t'i kasha n'a di be sv'ah'a /
translated: Om, O goddess, I offer you this perfume.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this food.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this drink.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this music.

original: aom ku ru ku ru bi dza ya sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom ku ru ku ru bi dza ya sv'ah'a /
translated: Om, O goddess, I offer you this flower.

original: lhan cig lha dang dbus su ni //🔽bzlas pa gcig gis bsdu bar bya //
analyzed: lhan cig lha dang dbus su ni // bzlas pa gcig gis bsdu bar bya //
translated: Om, O goddess, I offer you this incense.

analyzed: dpa' bo 'bar ba'i bdag nyid che // phyag gnyis sbyor ba'i gdan la ni // de yi zhal du sreg blugs ni //
translated: Om, O goddess, I offer you this lamp.

analyzed: kun na sa lha nyid tshim par bya //
translated: Om, O goddess, I offer you this perfume.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this food.

original: dngos pe brgyad kyi mchod pa ni //
analyzed: dngos pe brgyad kyi mchod pa ni //
translated: Om, O goddess, I offer you this drink.

original: h'um gi glu yi rnam pa yis //🔽sangs rgyas kun nas mnyes par bya //
analyzed: h'um gi glu yi rnam pa yis // sangs rgyas kun nas mnyes par bya //
translated: Om, O goddess, I offer you this music.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this flower.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas nas //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas nas //
translated: Om, O goddess, I offer you this incense.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this lamp.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this perfume.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this food.

original: dku yi phyogs su gzung bar bya //
analyzed: dku yi phyogs su gzung bar bya //
translated: Om, O goddess, I offer you this drink.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this music.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this flower.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this incense.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this lamp.

original: me tog tshul gyis gtor ba dang // gling bu'i tshul gyis 'bud pa dang // sil snyan tshul gyis dkrol ba dang // gar gyi tshul gyis yan lag bskyod //
analyzed: me tog tshul gyis gtor ba dang // gling bu'i tshul gyis 'bud pa dang // sil snyan tshul gyis dkrol ba dang // gar gyi tshul gyis yan lag bskyod //
translated: Om, O goddess, I offer you this perfume.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this food.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this drink.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this music.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this flower.🔽 Om, O goddess, I offer you this incense.🔽 Om,

original: 'bud pa'i tshul gyis 'bud pa dang // rgyal mtshan tshul gyis bsgreng ba dang // bla re'i tshul gyis bre ba dang // ba dan tshul gyis 'phyar ba dang // rlung g-yab tshul gyis g-yab pa dang // lha nyid la mchod phyir ni mchog tu 'dud //
analyzed: 'bud pa'i tshul gyis 'bud pa dang // rgyal mtshan tshul gyis bsgreng ba dang // bla re'i tshul gyis bre ba dang // ba dan tshul gyis 'phyar ba dang // rlung g-yab tshul gyis g-yab pa dang // lha nyid la mchod phyir ni mchog tu 'dud //
translated: and the way of bowing to the gods for worship.

original: zhi phyir phyag 'tshal 'dud pas zhi bar byed //
analyzed: zhi phyir phyag 'tshal 'dud pas zhi bar byed //
translated: For peace, one bows and pays homage, pacifying with homage.

original: spro phyir phyag 'tshal 'dud la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: spro phyir phyag 'tshal 'dud la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: For expansion, one bows and pays homage, bowing and paying homage to expansion.

original: bdag med rnal 'byor grub phyir h'um 'byin sa bon 'dzin par mdzad //
analyzed: bdag med rnal 'byor grub phyir h'um 'byin sa bon 'dzin par mdzad //
translated: For the accomplishment of the yoga of selflessness, one utters hum and holds the seed.

original: bdag med par sbyor rnam par snang mdzad dngos la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: bdag med par sbyor rnam par snang mdzad dngos la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: For the union with selflessness, one bows and pays homage to the actual Vairocana.

original: khyad par glu dang mchod pas me la mchod par bya ste sgras @203b 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: khyad par glu dang mchod pas me la mchod par bya ste sgras @203b 'jug par bya'o //

original: de bzhin du phyis sreg blugs phyed dang bzhis me lha mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du phyis sreg blugs phyed dang bzhis me lha mchod par bya'o //
translated: Similarly, later one should worship the fire god with four and a half oblations.

original: le'u dang po zhes bya ba'o ////
analyzed: le'u dang po zhes bya ba'o ////
translated: This is the first chapter.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, what should be explained next is

original: slar yang me yi brtag pa ni //
analyzed: slar yang me yi brtag pa ni //
translated: Again, the examination of fire:

original: mtho bar 'bar bas zhi pa'o //🔽dma' bar 'bar bas rgyas pa nyid //
analyzed: mtho bar 'bar bas zhi pa'o // dma' bar 'bar bas rgyas pa nyid //
translated: If it blazes upward, it is pacifying.🔽If it blazes downward, it is enriching.

original: 'khor bar 'bar bas dbang dang ldan //
analyzed: 'khor bar 'bar bas dbang dang ldan //
translated: If it circles, it is powerful.

original: du bar 'bar bas bdag nyid 'joms //
analyzed: du bar 'bar bas bdag nyid 'joms //
translated: If it blazes with smoke, it is destroying.

original: de bzhin me yi de nyid ni //
analyzed: de bzhin me yi de nyid ni //
translated: Thus, the reality of fire

original: blo ldan rnal 'byor pas shes byed //
analyzed: blo ldan rnal 'byor pas shes byed //
translated: should be known by the wise yogī.

original: dbang ldan du ni zhi ba nyid //
analyzed: dbang ldan du ni zhi ba nyid //
translated: In the northeast, it is pacifying;

original: shar du dpal dang mngon par 'grogs //🔽me yi phyogs su rgyas pa nyid //
analyzed: shar du dpal dang mngon par 'grogs // me yi phyogs su rgyas pa nyid //
translated: in the east, it is glorious and prosperous;🔽in the southeast, it is enriching;

original: lho phyogs su ni nor brlag go /
analyzed: lho phyogs su ni nor brlag go /
translated: in the south, it is losing wealth;

original: bden bral 'chi ba'i pho nya nyid //
analyzed: bden bral 'chi ba'i pho nya nyid //
translated: in the southwest, it is the messenger of death;

original: nub tu dbang ni brtsam par bya //
analyzed: nub tu dbang ni brtsam par bya //
translated: in the west, it is the beginning of power;🔽in the northwest, it is the loss of wealth;

original: rlung du nor ni nyams pa dang // byang du rigs ni rnam par 'phel //
analyzed: rlung du nor ni nyams pa dang // byang du rigs ni rnam par 'phel //
translated: and in the north, the family increases.

original: le'u gnyis pa zhes bya ba'o ////
analyzed: le'u gnyis pa zhes bya ba'o ////
translated: This is the second chapter.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, next, I will explain

original: yam shing gi ni brtag pa ni //
analyzed: yam shing gi ni brtag pa ni //
translated: the examination of the sacrificial wood.

original: yam shing gi ni bye brag nyid //
analyzed: yam shing gi ni bye brag nyid //
translated: The specific types of sacrificial wood:

original: zhi ba la ni sor mo bcu //
analyzed: zhi ba la ni sor mo bcu //
translated: For pacifying, there are ten finger-widths;

original: rgyas pa la ni skyes bu nyid; ;mngon spyod la ni brgyad pa po //
analyzed: rgyas pa la ni skyes bu nyid; ;mngon spyod la ni brgyad pa po //
translated: for the violent [rite], the wood of the eight [types of] trees;

original: dbang la bcu gnyis pa nyid dang // dbye ba de bzhin 'o ma'i shing //
analyzed: dbang la bcu gnyis pa nyid dang // dbye ba de bzhin 'o ma'i shing //
translated: for the rite of subjugation, the wood of the twelve [types of] trees;🔽and for the rite of summoning, the wood of the milk-exuding trees.

original: de bzhin padma bri yang kun //
analyzed: de bzhin padma bri yang kun //
translated: Likewise, all the wood of the lotus family

original: khyad par du ni zhi ba la //
analyzed: khyad par du ni zhi ba la //
translated: is especially recommended for the rite of pacification.

original: yam shing 'di ni cho ga'i mchog /🔽thang shing de bzhin shing dang ni //🔽'o ma 'dzag pa'i shing ji bzhin //🔽yam shing gi ni cho ga mchog /
analyzed: yam shing 'di ni cho ga'i mchog / thang shing de bzhin shing dang ni // 'o ma 'dzag pa'i shing ji bzhin // yam shing gi ni cho ga mchog /
translated: This is the supreme procedure for the wood.

original: rgyas pa la ni sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: rgyas pa la ni sbyar bar bya //
translated: For the rite of prosperity, one should use

original: bha la ta ka sgur po'i shing //🔽bya rog tshang gi @204a *//
analyzed: bha la ta ka sgur po'i shing // bya rog tshang gi @204a *//
translated: the wood of the milk-exuding trees,

original: shing ji bzhin //
analyzed: shing ji bzhin //
translated: just as [described] above.

original: yam shing gi ni cho ga mchog /
analyzed: yam shing gi ni cho ga mchog /
translated: This is the supreme procedure for the wood.🔽For the rite of pacification, one should use

original: shing gi nag po'i las la sbyar //
analyzed: shing gi nag po'i las la sbyar //
translated: the wood of the black [type of] trees.🔽It is explained that for the rite of pacification,

original: 'o mar ldan pa'i btung ba dang // de bzhin 'bras dang 'bru mnyam pas; ;zhi ba la ni sbyar bar bshad //
analyzed: 'o mar ldan pa'i btung ba dang // de bzhin 'bras dang 'bru mnyam pas; ;zhi ba la ni sbyar bar bshad //
translated: one should use milk and rice mixed together.

original: sbyin sreg gi ni cho ga mchog /🔽gi wang dang ni gur gum nyid //
analyzed: sbyin sreg gi ni cho ga mchog / gi wang dang ni gur gum nyid //
translated: This is the supreme procedure for the oblation.🔽For the rite of prosperity, one should use

original: thams cad 'bru dang mnyam ldan pa //
analyzed: thams cad 'bru dang mnyam ldan pa //
translated: camphor and saffron mixed with all the grains.

original: de bzhin rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg go ;yang na gser gyi lha dang ni //
analyzed: de bzhin rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg go ;yang na gser gyi lha dang ni //
translated: Or else, the golden deity,🔽punarnavā, saffron,

original: punda r'i ka gur gum dang // aa ru ra yi me tog brgya //
analyzed: punda r'i ka gur gum dang // aa ru ra yi me tog brgya //
translated: and a hundred flowers of myrobalan.

original: dbang la sbyar bar yang dag mtshungs //
analyzed: dbang la sbyar bar yang dag mtshungs //
translated: For power, it is applied in the same way.🔽Bhallātaka, long pepper,🔽poison, and likewise blood,

original: bha la ta ka lung tang dang // dug dang de bzhin khrag nyid dang // tsha ba'i mar khu de bzhin skra //
analyzed: bha la ta ka lung tang dang // dug dang de bzhin khrag nyid dang // tsha ba'i mar khu de bzhin skra //
translated: hot oil, and likewise black hair,

original: nag po'i phyogs la sbyar ba nyid //
analyzed: nag po'i phyogs la sbyar ba nyid //
translated: is applied to the dark side.

original: le'u gsum pa zhes bya ba'o ////
analyzed: le'u gsum pa zhes bya ba'o ////
translated: This is the third chapter.🔽Now, I will explain further:

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba; ;'byung po gnod sbyin de bzhin klu //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba; ;'byung po gnod sbyin de bzhin klu //
translated: bhūtas, yakṣas, and likewise nāgas,

original: lha dang nam mkha' lding dang ni //
analyzed: lha dang nam mkha' lding dang ni //
translated: gods, garuḍas,🔽and the yakṣa who causes insanity and wandering,

original: smyo dang 'khor byed gnod sbyin dang // lha mo ma mo'i bdag nyid ni //
analyzed: smyo dang 'khor byed gnod sbyin dang // lha mo ma mo'i bdag nyid ni //
translated: the goddess, and the nature of the mātṛs,

original: dkyil 'khor dgu ni mngon byas nas //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dgu ni mngon byas nas //
translated: having manifested the nine maṇḍalas,🔽the nine squares and nine parts,🔽in the center, one's own deity,

original: re'u mig dgu dang cha dgu dang // dbus su bdag gi lha nyid dang // dbang ldan du ni lha yi ris //🔽shar du klu yi cha dang ni //
analyzed: re'u mig dgu dang cha dgu dang // dbus su bdag gi lha nyid dang // dbang ldan du ni lha yi ris // shar du klu yi cha dang ni //
translated: in the northeast, the deity's form,🔽in the east, the nāga part,

original: me yi phyogs su gnod sbyin nyid //
analyzed: me yi phyogs su gnod sbyin nyid //
translated: in the southeast, the yakṣa itself,

original: lho phyogs su ni 'byung po'o //🔽de bzhin smyo byed bde na bral du'o //
analyzed: lho phyogs su ni 'byung po'o // de bzhin smyo byed bde na bral du'o //
translated: In the south, the Bhūtas.

original: nub tu nam mkha' lding nyid dang // rlung gi phyogs su gtor ma mtshungs //
analyzed: nub tu nam mkha' lding nyid dang // rlung gi phyogs su gtor ma mtshungs //
translated: In the west, the Garuḍas.

original: byang du 'khor byed gnod sbyin no //
analyzed: byang du 'khor byed gnod sbyin no //
translated: In the north, the Yakṣas.

original: @204b bdag nyid cha yis mchod par bya //
analyzed: @204b bdag nyid cha yis mchod par bya //
translated: One should worship with one’s own share.

original: le'u bzhi pa zhes bya ba'o ////
analyzed: le'u bzhi pa zhes bya ba'o ////
translated: This is the fourth chapter.

original: dkar po'i 'od mchog mi bzad mngon par rol pa gsang ba la mkhas lce'o //
analyzed: dkar po'i 'od mchog mi bzad mngon par rol pa gsang ba la mkhas lce'o //
translated: The supreme white light, the unbearable manifest, skilled in the secret, is the tongue.

original: steng gi mche ba gnyis la chu 'byin ro ni 'o ma'i chu zhes pa //
analyzed: steng gi mche ba gnyis la chu 'byin ro ni 'o ma'i chu zhes pa //
translated: The two upper fangs emit water, the taste is milk water,

original: 'phyar ba'i chu yi kha dog dang mtshungs mche ba gnyis ni rtsa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'phyar ba'i chu yi kha dog dang mtshungs mche ba gnyis ni rtsa bzhin no //
translated: the two fangs are like the color of churned water, like roots.🔽The water that removes the torment of the tongue is the white nectar, the five nectars,

original: lce yi gdung ba sel ba'i chu ni bdud rtsi dkar po'i bdud rtsi lnga; ;rgyas pa lnga la bdud rtsi'i ro bzhin sbyor ba mkhas pas mi shes so //
analyzed: lce yi gdung ba sel ba'i chu ni bdud rtsi dkar po'i bdud rtsi lnga; ;rgyas pa lnga la bdud rtsi'i ro bzhin sbyor ba mkhas pas mi shes so //
translated: the taste of nectar in the five expansions, the skilled one does not know the union.

original: lce la de bzhin dkar po'i sa bon de ni dud pa'i lcags kyus drangs //
analyzed: lce la de bzhin dkar po'i sa bon de ni dud pa'i lcags kyus drangs //
translated: On the tongue, likewise, that white seed is drawn by the smoke hook.

original: sna la ro yi dgod pa'i bdud rtsi rlung gi lcags kyu yis ni 'dren //
analyzed: sna la ro yi dgod pa'i bdud rtsi rlung gi lcags kyu yis ni 'dren //
translated: The nectar of the deployment of taste in the nose is drawn up by the hook of the wind.

original: rig pas rig pa mthong ba de ltar de yi bdud rtsi rnam par thim //
